targetString: Izilawuli ezifanele zengozi endaweni yomsebenzi zincike endaweni yokusebenza nohlobo lomsebenzi, ngokusekela ekuhloleni ubungozi bemithombo yokuchayeka, ubunzima besifo emphakathini, nezinto eziyingozi kubasebenzi ngabanye okungenzeka babuthaka ekunqandeni i-COVID-19.
translated: Ukulawulwa kwezingozi okufanele emsebenzini kuncike endaweni yomsebenzi kanye nomsebenzi, okusekelwe ekuhlolweni kobungozi bemithombo yokuchayeka, ukuqina kwezifo emphakathini, nezici zobungozi zabasebenzi abangaba sengozini yokuthola i-COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Ngokusho kwe-U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), imisebenzi enokuchayeka okuphansi kwengozi inezinga eliphansi lokuthintana nomphakathi nezinye izisebenzi, okuthi izinyathelo ezilula zokuvikela ziyakhuthazwa, kuhlanganisa ukuhlanza izandla, ukukhuthaza izisebenzi ukuthi zihlale emakhaya uma zigula, imikhuba emihle yokuphefumula, nokugcina inqubo yokuhlanza nokubulala amagciwane endaweni yokusebenza.
translated: Ngokusho kwe-US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), imisebenzi esengozini yokuchayeka kancane inokuxhumana okuncane nomphakathi nabanye osebenza nabo, okunconyelwa izindlela eziyisisekelo zokuvikela ukutheleleka, okubandakanya ukugeza izandla, ukukhuthaza abasebenzi ukuthi bahlale ekhaya uma begula. , imikhuba yokuphefumula, nokugcina ukuhlanza okujwayelekile kanye nokubulala amagciwane endaweni yokusebenza.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Imisebenzi enokuchayeka engozini okuphakathi ihlanganisa leyo efuna ukuthinta njalo futhi okuseduze nabantu abangaziwa noma abasolwa ukuba ne-COVID-19, kodwa bangase babe negciwane ngenxa yokudluliselana okuqhubekayo emphakathini noma ukuvakashela emazweni angaphandle.
translated: Imisebenzi esengozini yokuchayeka emaphakathi ihlanganisa leyo edinga ukuxhumana njalo noma eduze nabantu abangaziwa noma okusolwa ukuthi bane-COVID-19, kodwa abangase batheleleke ngenxa yokudluliselwa komphakathi okuqhubekayo noma uhambo lwamazwe ngamazwe.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Lokhu kuhlanganisa izisebenzi ezinokuthintana nomphakathi ovamile njengezikole, izindawe zokusebenza ezigcwala abantu abaminyene, kanye nezimo zokuthengisa ezinabaningi.
translated: Lokhu kufaka phakathi abasebenzi abaxhumana nomphakathi jikelele njengasezikoleni, ezindaweni zokusebenza ezinabantu abaningi, kanye nezilungiselelo zokudayisa ezinomthamo omkhulu.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: Izilawuli zengozi kuleli qembu, ngaphezu kwezinyathelo zokuvikela igciwane ezilula, zihlanganisa i-ventilation esebenzisa i-high-efficiency air filters, ama-sneeze guards, kanye nokuba ne-personal protective equipment etholakalayo ezimweni lapho kutholakala umuntu one- COVID-19.
translated: Izilawuli eziyingozi zaleli qembu, ngaphezu kwezinyathelo eziyisisekelo zokuvimbela ukutheleleka, zihlanganisa ukungena komoya kusetshenziswa izihlungi zomoya ezisebenza kahle kakhulu, onogada abathimula, kanye nokuba nezinto zokuzivikela ezitholakalayo uma kwenzeka umuntu one-COVID-19 ehlangana.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: I-OSHA ibheka abasebenzi bezempilo nabasemakhazeni abachayeka kubantu abaziwayo noma abasolwa ngokuba ne-COVID-19 njengabasengozini ephakeme yokuchayeka, okuphakamela engozini ephakeme kakhulu yokuchayeka uma izisebenzi zenza ama-aerosol-generating procedures, noma zilanda noma ziphatha ama-specimens asuka kubantu abaziwayo noma abasolwa ngokuba ne-COVID-19.
translated: I-OSHA ibheka abasebenzi bezempilo kanye nabasemakhazeni abachayeke kumuntu owaziwayo noma okusolakala ukuthi one-COVID-19 basengozini enkulu yokuchayeka, ekhuphukela engcupheni ephezulu kakhulu yokuchayeka uma abasebenzi benza izinqubo zokukhiqiza i-aerosol, noma beqoqa noma bephatha izifanekiso kumuntu owaziwayo noma osolwayo. nge-COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Izilawuli zengozi ezifanelekayo kulezi sebenzi kuhlanganisa izilawuli zokwakha njengama-negative pressure ventilation rooms, ne- personal protective equipment efanele emsebenzini.
translated: Izilawuli eziyingozi ezifanele lezi zisebenzi zihlanganisa izilawuli zobunjiniyela ezifana namagumbi okungenisa umoya ongemuhle, nezinto zokuzivikela ezifanele umsebenzi.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: ukuqubuka kwe*COVID-19 kungaba nemiphumela enzima ngaphakathi endaweni yomsebenzi.
translated: Ukuqubuka kwe-COVID-19 kungaba nemiphumela eminingana endaweni yokusebenza.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Izisebenzi zingase zingabibikho emsebenzini ngenxa yokugula, isidingo sokunakekela abanye, noma ngenxa yokusaba ithuba lokuchayeka.
translated: Izisebenzi zingase zingabi khona emsebenzini ngenxa yokugula, ukudinga ukunakekela abanye, noma ngenxa yokwesaba ukuchayeka.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Imikhuba youthengisa ingase ishintshe, kukho kokubili uhlobo lwezimpahla ezifunekayo, anezindlela zokukuzithola lezi zimpahla (njengokuthenga ngezikhathi ezingekho matasa noma ngokulethelwa noma nemisebenzi yokudlula ngokushayela).
translated: Amaphethini ohwebo angashintsha, kokubili ngokuya ngokuthi yiziphi izimpahla ezifunwayo, kanye nezindlela zokuthola lezi zimpahla (njengokuthenga ngamahora angasebenzi kakhulu noma ngokudiliva noma ngamasevisi okushayela).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: Okokugcina, ukuthunyelwa kwezinto ezisuka ezindaweni ezithintwe kanzima i-COVID-19 kungase kuphazamiseke. Ukulungela isifo esithelelanayo nohlelo lokusabela kungasibenziswa ukuze kuqondise izenzo ezivikelayo.
translated: Okokugcina, ukuthunyelwa kwezinto ezivela ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu i-COVID-19 kungase kuphazamiseke.Ukulungela isifo esithathelwanayo nohlelo lokusabela kungasetshenziswa ukuze kuqondiswe izenzo zokuzivikela.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Izinhlelo zibheka amazinga engozi ahilelekile ezindaweni ezingafani zokusebenza nohlobo lomsebenzi, zihlanganisa uhlobo lokuchayeka, izinto eziyingozi eziphakama ekhaya noma ezimweni zomphakathi, nezinto eziyingozi zabasebenzi ngabanye njengiminyaka ephakeme noma izimo zezifo ezingomahlalakhona.
translated: Izinhlelo zibhekana namazinga obungozi ahlotshaniswa nezindawo zokusebenza ezahlukahlukene nemisebenzi, okuhlanganisa imithombo yokuchayeka, izici eziyingozi ezivela kuzilungiselelo zasekhaya nomphakathi, nezici zobungozi zezisebenzi ngazinye njengokuguga noma izimo zezempilo ezingamahlalakhona.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Ziphinde zicacise ukulawula okufanele ukuze kuhlangabezwe lezo zingozi, futhi izinhlelo ezilandelayo zezimo ezingaphakama njengomphumela wokuqubuka.
translated: Ziphinde ziveze izilawuli ezidingekayo zokubhekana nalezo zingozi, kanye nezinhlelo zezimo eziphuthumayo zezimo ezingase ziphakame ngenxa yokuqubuka kwezifo.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Ukulungela isifo esithelelanayo nezinhlelo zokusabela zingase zincike kokukhuthazwa umthetho wezwe noma wezifundazwe.
translated: Ukulungela izifo ezithathelwanayo kanye nezinhlelo zokusabela kungase kube ngaphansi kwezincomo zikazwelonke noma zamazwe angaphansi.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Izinjongo zokusabela esimweni sokuqubuka zihlanganisa ukunciphisa ukudliliselana phakathi nabasebenzi, ukuvikela abantu abasengozini ephakeme yezinkinga ezinzima zempilo, ukugcina imisebenzi yebhizinisi, nokunciphisa imiphumela enzima kwamanye amabhizinisi nabaphakeli bokuthenga.
translated: Izinhloso zokubhekana nokuqubuka kodlame zihlanganisa ukunciphisa ukusuleleka phakathi kwabasebenzi, ukuvikela abantu abasengozini enkulu yezinkinga zempilo ezimbi, ukugcinwa kwebhizinisi, kanye nokunciphisa imiphumela emibi kwezinye izinhlangano kumaketanga azo wokuhlinzeka.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: Ubunzima besifo emphakathini ibhizinisi elikuwo kuthinta izinyathelo zokusabela ezithathwayo.
translated: Ukuqina kwesifo emphakathini lapho ibhizinisi likhona kuthinta izimpendulo ezithathiwe.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Izitebhisi zokulawula izingozi ifremuwekhi esebenziswa kabanzi ku-occupational safety and health ekuhlanganiseni izilawuli zengozi ngemiphumela.
translated: Izigaba zokulawula izingozi ziwuhlaka olusetshenziswa kabanzi ekuphepheni nakwezempilo emsebenzini ukuze kuhlanganiswe izilawuli eziyingozi ngokusebenza ngempumelelo.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Lapho izingozi ze-COVID-19 zingasuseki, ukulawula okusebenza kangcono ukulawula kokwakha, kulandelwa ukulawu kokuphatha, futhi ekugcineni izinto zokuvikela umuntu siqu.
translated: Lapho izingozi ze-COVID-19 zingenakuqedwa khona, izilawuli ezisebenza kahle kakhulu izilawuli zobunjiniyela, ezilandelwa izilawuli zokuphatha, futhi okokugcina okokuvikela okomuntu siqu.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Izilawuli zokwakha zihilela ukuhlukanisa abasebenzi ezingozini ezihlobene nomsebenzi ngaphandle kokuthembela emkhubeni wesisebenzi, futhi zingaba isinyathelo esonga izindleko kakhulu lapho sifakwa.
translated: Izilawuli zobunjiniyela zibandakanya ukwehlukanisa abasebenzi ezingozini ezihlobene nomsebenzi ngaphandle kokuncika ekuziphatheni kwabasebenzi, futhi kungaba yisixazululo esingabizi kakhulu ukusisebenzisa.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Izilawuli zokuphatha izinguquko emthethweni womsebenzi noma izinqubo odinga isinyathelo sesisebenzi noma somqashi
translated: Izilawuli zokuphatha izinguquko kunqubomgomo yomsebenzi noma izinqubo ezidinga isinyathelo somsebenzi noma umqashi.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) icatshangela iphumelela ngezinga eliphansi kunokulawula kokwakha nokulawula kokuphatha, kodwa kungasiza ekugwemeni ukuchayeka okuthile.
translated: Izinto zokuzivikela zomuntu siqu (i-PPE) zibhekwa njengezisebenza kancane kunezilawuli zobunjiniyela nezokuphatha, kodwa zingasiza ekuvimbeleni ukuchayeka okuthile.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Zonke izinhlobo ze-PPE kumele zikhethwe ngokusekelwe engozini yesesebenzi, igqokwe ngendlela efanele njengokufanelekile (isib., amarespiretha), kugqokwe njalo futhi ngendlela, ihlolwe njalo, igcinwe, futhi ishintshwe, ngokwesidingo, futhi isuswe ngendlela efanele, ihlanzwe, futhi igcinwe noma or ilahlwe kugwenywe ukungcola.
translated: Zonke izinhlobo ze-PPE kufanele zikhethwe ngokusekelwe engozini esisebenzini, zifakwe ngendlela efanele njengoba kufanele (isb., ama-respirators), zigqokwe njalo nangokufanele, zihlolwe njalo, zigcinwe, zishintshwe, njengoba kudingekile, futhi zikhishwe ngokufanele, zihlanzwe, futhi zigcinwe noma elahliwe ukuze kugwenywe ukungcoliswa.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Ngokusho kwe-U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), imisebenzi enokuchayeka okuphansi inokuthintana okuncane nomphakathi nezinye izisebenti ezingontanga.
translated: Ngokusho kwe-US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), imisebenzi esengozini ephansi inokuxhumana okuncane nomphakathi nabanye osebenza nabo.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Izinyathelo ezilula zokuvikela igciwane ezikhuthaziwe kuzo zonke izindawo zokusebenza zihlanganisa ukuhlanza izandla kaningi futhi ngokwenzisisa, ukukhuthaza izisebenzi ukuthi zihlale ekhaya uma zigula, imikhuba yokuziphatha emihle yokuphefumula ehlanganisa ukumboza ukukhwehlela nokuthimula, ukuhlinzekela ngamathishu nezithako zomgqomo, ukulungiselela ukusebenzela ekhaya noma amashifu ashiyanayo kuye ngesidingo, khuthaza izisebenzi ukuthi zigweme ukusebenzisa amathuluzi abanye nezinto zokusebenza, futhi ziqhubeke zigcine inqubo yokuhlanza nokubulala amagciwane endaweni yomsebenzi.
translated: Izinyathelo eziyisisekelo zokuvimbela ukutheleleka ezinconyelwe kuzo zonke izindawo zokusebenza zifaka ukugeza izandla njalo nangokucophelela, ukukhuthaza abasebenzi ukuthi bahlale ekhaya uma begula, imikhuba yokuphefumula ehlanganisa ukuvala ukukhwehlela nokuthimula, ukuhlinzeka ngezicubu kanye nesitsha sikadoti, ukulungiselela ukushintshwa kwezingcingo noma ezinyakazayo uma kudingeka, ukudikibalisa izisebenzi. ekusebenziseni amathuluzi wabanye nezinto zokusebenza, kanye nokugcina ukuhlanza okujwayelekile kanye nokubulala amagciwane endaweni yokusebenza.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Ukutholakala okusheshayo nokuhlukaniswa kwabantu okungenzeka banegciwane isinyathelo esibalulekile ekuvikeleni izisebenzi, amakhasimende, izibakashi, nabanye endaweni yomsebenzi.
translated: Ukuhlonzwa ngokushesha kanye nokuhlukaniswa kwabantu okungenzeka banezifo kuyisinyathelo esibalulekile sokuvikela abasebenzi, amakhasimende, izivakashi, nabanye endaweni yokusebenza.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: I-U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) ikhuthaza ukuthi izisebenzi ezinezimpawu ze-acute respiratory illness kumele zihlale emakhaya kuze kube yilapho zingasenakho ukushisa, nezinye izimpawu okungenani amahora angu-24 ngaphandle kokusebenzisa imithi eyehlisa ukushisa noma eguqula izimpawu, nokuthi imithetho yezinsuku zokugula ibe egobekayo, vumela izisebenzi ukuthi zihlale ekhaya ukuze zinakekele ilungu lomndeni eligulayo, nokuthi abasebenzi bayazi lemithetho.
translated: I-US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) incoma ukuthi abasebenzi abanezimpawu zesifo esinamandla sokuphefumula kufanele bahlale ekhaya kuze kube yilapho bengenayo imfiva, izimpawu zomkhuhlane, nanoma yiziphi ezinye izimpawu okungenani amahora angama-24 ngaphandle kokusebenzisa umuthi. enciphisa umkhuhlane noma eminye imithi eshintsha izimpawu, nokuthi izinqubomgomo zekhefu lokugula ziyaguquguquka, zivumela abasebenzi ukuthi bahlale ekhaya ukuze banakekele ilungu lomndeni eligulayo, nokuthi abasebenzi bayazazi lezi zinqubomgomo.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Ngokusho kwe-OSHA, imisebenzi enokuchayeka okuphakathi ihlanganisa leyo misebenzi edinga ukuthintana njalo noma eduze ngamagxathi ayisithupha (1.8 m) nabantu abangaziwanoma abacatshangelwa ukuba iziguli ze-COVID-19, babe negciwane le-SARS-CoV-2 ngenxa yokudluluselana okuqhubekayo emphakathini oseduzane nendawo yokusebenza, noma ngesizathu sokuthi othile usanda kubuya ezweni langaphandle eliyindawo enokusabalala kokudluliselana nge-COVID-19.
translated: Ngokusho kwe-OSHA, imisebenzi esengozini yokuchayeka emaphakathi ihlanganisa leyo edinga ukuthintana njalo noma eduze namamitha ayi-1.8 abantu abangaziwa noma okusolakala ukuthi bayiziguli ze-COVID-19, kodwa okungenzeka bangenwe yi-SARS-CoV-2 ngenxa yomphakathi oqhubekayo. ukudluliselwa endaweni yebhizinisi, noma ngenxa yokuthi umuntu unohambo lwamazwe ngamazwe muva nje oluya endaweni enokudluliselwa kwe-COVID-19 okusabalele.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Laba bahlanganisa izisebenzi ezinokuthintana nomphakathi ovamile njengezikole, izindawo zokusebenza ezigcwala kakhulu abantu, nezimo zokudayisa zesimo esiphakeme. Ukwakha izilawuli zala maqembu engozi ephakeme kuhlanganisa ukufaka ama-air filters ezinga eliphakeme lokusebenza, ukuphakamisa izinga le-ventilation, ukufaka imingcele njengeziqaphi zokuthimula zepulastiki, nokufaka iwindi lokudlula ngokushayela lesevisi yamakhasimende. Ukulawula kokuphatha kuleli qembu lemisebenzi enokuchayeka okuphakeme kuhlanganisa ukukhuthaza izisebenzi ezigulayo ukuthi zihlale emakhaya, ukufaka indlela yokuxhumana ngenqubo ye-virtual ukuthi ithathe indawo yemihlangano yobuso-nobuso, ukuqalisa amashifu ashiyanayo, ukumisa uhambo olungabalulekile oluya ezindaweni ezinokuqubuka kwe-COVID-19, ukwakha izinhlelo zokuxhumana kwesimo esiphuthumay okuhlanganisa i-forum yokuphendula izinkathazo zabasebenzi, ukuhlinzekela abasebenzi ngemfundo nokuqeqeshwa kwakamuva mayelana nezinto eziyingozi nge-COVID-19 nemikhuba yokuzivikela, ukuqeqesha abasebenzi abadinga ukusebenzisa izingubo ezivikelayo nendlela yokuzisebenzisa, ukuhlinzekela ngezinsizi nendawo yokusebenza ekhuthaza inhlanzeko yomuntu siqu, efuna ukuhlanzwa kwezandla njalo, ukubeka umkhawulo wamakhasimende nomphakathi wokufinyelela indawo yomsebenzi, nokuposa izimpawu mayelana nokuhlanza izandla izinyathelo zokuvikela i-COVID-19. Kuye ngokuncika emsebenzini, abasebenzi abachayeka ngezinga eliphakathi bangase badinge ukugqoka izinto zokuzivikela ezihlanganisa inhlanganisela yamagilavu, ingubo, isembozo sobuso noma imaski yobuso, noma izibuko.
translated: Lokhu kufaka phakathi izisebenzi ezithintana nomphakathi jikelele njengasezikoleni, izindawo zokusebenza ezinabantu abaningi, kanye nezindawo zokudayisa ezinomthamo omkhulu.Izilawuli zobunjiniyela zalokhu kanye namaqembu asengozini enkulu zihlanganisa ukufaka izihlungi zomoya ezisebenza kahle kakhulu, ukunyusa izinga lokungena komoya. , ukufaka izithiyo ezibonakalayo ezifana nezigada zokuthimula zepulasitiki ezicacile, kanye nokufaka iwindi lokushayela lidlula ukuze uthole isevisi yamakhasimende.Izilawuli zokuphatha zalokhu kanye namaqembu asengozini enkulu zihlanganisa ukukhuthaza izisebenzi ezigulayo ukuthi zihlale ekhaya, ukufaka esikhundleni semihlangano yobuso nobuso ngokuxhumana okungokoqobo, ukusungula amashifu ashintshashintshayo, ukuyeka uhambo olungabalulekile lokuya ezindaweni ezinokuqubuka okuqhubekayo kwe-COVID-19, ukuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuxhumana eziphuthumayo okuhlanganisa nenkundla yokuphendula izinkathazo zabasebenzi, ukuhlinzeka abasebenzi ngemfundo nokuqeqeshwa kwakamuva ngezinto eziyingozi ze-COVID-19 kanye nokuziphatha kokuzivikela, ukuqeqesha abasebenzi okudingeka basebenzise izingubo ezivikelayo kanye nezinto zokusebenza ukuthi zisetshenziswa kanjani, ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza kanye nendawo yokusebenza ekhuthaza ukuhlanzeka komuntu siqu, okudinga ukugeza izandla njalo, okukhawulela ukufinyelela kwamakhasimende kanye nomphakathi endaweni yokusebenza, nokuthumela izimpawu mayelana nokugeza izandla nokunye. Izinyathelo zokuzivikela ze-COVID-19. Kuye ngomsebenzi womsebenzi, izisebenzi ezisengozini yokuchayeka okungenani emaphakathi kungase kudingeke ukuthi bagqoke izinto zokuzivikela ezihlanganisa inhlanganisela ethile yamagilavu, ingubo, isivikelo sobuso noma imaski yobuso, noma izibuko.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Izisebenzi ezikuleli qembu lokuchayeka azivamile ukudinga ukusebenzisa amarespiretha.
translated: Izisebenzi ezikuleli qembu eliyingozi azivamile ukudinga ukusetshenziswa kwama-respirators.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Uma umuntu eqala ukugula ebhanoyini, izinhlelo ezifanele zokulawula zokuvukela abasebenzi nabanye abagibeli zihlanganisa ukuhlukanisa umuntu ogulayo nabanye ngebanga lamagxathi angu-6, ukubeka ilungu elilodwa le-crew ukuthi linakekele umuntu ogulayo, nokunikeza imaski yobuso kumuntu ogulayo noma ukubuza umuntu ogulayo ukuthi amboze umlomo wakhe nekhala ngamathishu lapho ekhwehlela noma ethimula.
translated: Uma umuntu egula endizeni, izilawuli ezifanele zokuvikela abasebenzi nabanye abagibeli zihlanganisa ukwehlukanisa ogulayo kwabanye ngebanga elingamafidi ayi-6, ukuqoka ilungu elilodwa leqembu ukuthi lisize ogulayo, kanye nokunikeza umuntu ogula imaskhi yobuso. noma ukucela ogulayo ukuthi avale umlomo nekhala ngezicubu lapho ekhwehlela noma ethimula.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Ikhru yekhebhini kumele igqoke amagilavu lapho inakekela umgibeli ogulayo noma ithinta ukutshezi lomzimba noma izindawo okungenzeka zingcolile, futhi kungenzeka ukuthi izinto ezengeziwe zokuzivikela uma ogulayo enokushisa, ukukhwehlela okungaphezi, nalapho kunzima ukuphefumula.
translated: Abasebenzi basekhabetheni kufanele bagqoke amagilavu ezokwelapha alahlwayo lapho benakekela isihambi esigulayo noma bethinta uketshezi lomzimba noma indawo okungenzeka inamagciwane, futhi mhlawumbe nempahla yokuzivikela eyengeziwe uma umhambi ogulayo enomkhuhlane, ukukhwehlela okungapheli, noma ukuphefumula kanzima.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Amagilavu nezinye izinto ezilahlekayo kufanele zilahlwe ngesikhwama se-biohazard, futhi izindawo ezithole ukungcola kufanele zihlanzwe futhi zifakwe isibulala magciwane kamuva. Ngokuphathelene nemikhumbi yezimakethe, kuhlanganisa imikhumbi yokuvakasha neminye yokuthutha abagibeli, ukulawula ingoza kuhlanganisa ukuhlehlisa uhambo lapho ugula, nokuzihlukanisa futhi wazise isikhungo sokwelapha ngaphakathi ngokushesha uma othile eqala ukushisa noma ezinye izimpawu lapho esagibele.
translated: Amagilavu nezinye izinto ezilahlwayo kufanele zilahlwe esikhwameni se-biohazard, futhi izindawo ezingcolile kufanele zihlanzwe futhi zibulawe amagciwane ngemva kwalokho. Emikhumbini yezentengiselwano, okuhlanganisa imikhumbi ehamba ngomkhumbi neminye imikhumbi yabagibeli, ukulawulwa kwezingozi kubandakanya ukuhlehlisa ukuhamba lapho ugula, kanye nokuzihlukanisa nokwazisa. isikhungo sezokwelapha esigibele ngokushesha uma umuntu eba nomkhuhlane noma ezinye izimpawu ngesikhathi egibele.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Uma kungenzeka, ukulandelela kwezokulapha kumele kwenzakale kukhebhin yomuntu ozihlukanisile. Ezindaweni zezikole nenkulisa, i-CDC ikhuthaza ukuvala isikhashana ngenjongo yokuhlanza nokubulala amagciwane uma umuntu onegciwane eke waba ngaphakathi kwesakhiwo sesikole kungakhathaliseki ukusabalala.
translated: Ngokufanelekile, ukulandelelwa kwezokwelapha kufanele kwenzeke endlini yomuntu oyedwa.Ezikoleni nasezikhungweni zokunakekela izingane, i-CDC incoma ukuvalwa kwesikhashana ukuze kuhlanzwe noma kubulawe amagciwane uma umuntu onaleli gciwane ekade esendlini yesikole kungakhathaliseki ukuthi umphakathi usabalale kangakanani.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Uma kunokutheleleka okuncane kuya kokuphakathi emphakathi, amasu okuhlukanisa ngokuhlala kungenzeka aqaliswe njengokukhansela ama-field trip, imihlangano, neminye imibuthano emikhulu njengemfundo yezemvelo, amaklasi ekwaya noma ukudla emakhafethira, ukwandisa isikhala phakathi kwamadeski, ukufika ngezigamu nezikhathi zokugoduka, ukukhawula izivakashi ezingabalulekile, nokusebenzisa indawo yehhovisi lempilo elihlukile lezingane ezinezimpawu ezifana nomkhuhlane.
translated: Lapho kunokudluliswa komphakathi okuncane kuya kokulinganisela, amasu okuqhela emphakathini angasetshenziswa njengokukhansela uhambo lwasendle, imihlangano emikhulu, neminye imibuthano emikhulu efana nemfundo yokuzivocavoca noma amakilasi ekwaya noma ukudla endaweni yokudlela, okwandisa isikhala phakathi kwamadeski, ukufika okumangalisayo nokuxoshwa. izikhathi, ukukhawulela izivakashi ezingabalulekile, nokusebenzisa indawo ehlukile yehhovisi lezempilo yezingane ezinezimpawu ezinjengomkhuhlane.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Lapho igciwane lisakazeka ngendlela ephawulekayo emphakathini, naphezu kwemizamo yokuqhelelana kwabantu, kungase kucatshangelwe ukuvalwa kwezikole okweluliwe. Ezisebenzini zezomthetho ezenza imisebenzi yansuku zonke, ingozi yempilo ngaleso sikhathi ibhekwa njengephansi yi-CDC.
translated: Uma kunokudluliselwa okukhulu emphakathini wendawo, ngaphezu kwamasu okuqhelelana nomphakathi, ukuxoshwa kwesikole okwandisiwe kungase kucatshangelwe. Kubasebenzi bomthetho abenza imisebenzi yansuku zonke, ubungozi bezempilo bubhekwa buphansi yi-CDC.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Izisebenzi zezomthetho okumelwe zithintane nabantu abaqinisekisiwe noma okusolwa ukuthi bane-COVID-19 kukhuthazwa ukuba zilandele iziqondiso ezifanayo nezezisebenzi zezimo eziphuthumayo zezempilo, kuhlanganise nezinto ezifanele zomuntu zokuzivikela.
translated: Izikhulu zomthetho okufanele zixhumane nabantu okuqinisekisiwe noma okusolwa ukuthi bane-COVID-19 zinconywa ukuthi zilandele imihlahlandlela efanayo neyochwepheshe bezokwelapha eziphuthumayo, okuhlanganisa nemishini yokuzivikela efanele.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: Uma kwenzeka kuba nokusondelana kakhulu lapho umuntu etholakala, izisebenzi kufanele zihlanze futhi zisuse amagciwane emabhandeni azo omsebenzi nezinto ezizigqokile ngaphambi kokuba ziphinde zizisebenzise ngesifutho noma indwangu yokuhlanza yasendlini, futhi balandele izinqubo ezivamile zokuvimbela ukusakazeka kwegciwane nokulahlwa kwe-PPE esetshenzisiwe nangokugcina nokuwasha izingubo.
translated: Uma ukusondelana kwenzeka ngesikhathi besaba, abasebenzi kufanele bahlanze futhi babulale amagciwane ibhande labo lomsebenzi ngaphambi kokuba baphinde basebenzise isifutho sokuhlanza indlu noma ukusula, futhi balandele izinqubo ezijwayelekile zokusebenza zokunqanda nokulahlwa kwe-PPE esetshenzisiwe kanye nokuqukatha nokuwasha izingubo.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: I-OSHA icabangela ukuthi izisebenzi ezithile zezokwelapha nezasemakhazeni zisengozini enkulu noma enkulu kakhulu yokuchayeka esifweni.
translated: I-OSHA ibheka abasebenzi abathile bezempilo kanye nabasemakhazeni basezigabeni eziphezulu noma eziphakeme kakhulu zokuchayeka.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Imisebenzi yabachayeke engozini enkulu ihlanganisa abathumela izinto zokwelapha, izinto zokusiza, abasemalabhorethri, nezisebenzi ezithutha izinto zokwelapha ezichayeke ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19.
translated: Imisebenzi esengozini enkulu ihlanganisa ukulethwa kokunakekelwa kwezempilo, ukwesekwa, ilabhorethri, kanye nezisebenzi zezokuthutha zezokwelapha ezichayeka ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okusolwa ukuthi zine-COVID-19.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Lezi ziba izingozi ezinkulu kakhulu zokuchayeka esifweni uma izisebenzi zenza izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol, noma eziqongelela noma zisingathe amasampula, avela ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19.
translated: Lokhu kuba sengozini ephezulu kakhulu yokuchayeka uma abasebenzi benza izinqubo zokukhiqiza i-aerosol, noma beqoqa noma bephatha amasampula ezigulini ezaziwayo noma okusolwa ukuthi ziyi-COVID-19.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: Izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol zihlanganisa ukufakwa kweshubhu emzimbeni, izinqubo ezibangela ukukhwehlela, i-bronchoscopies, izinqubo nokuhlola okuthile kwamazinyo, noma ukuqoqwa kwamasampula omzimba.
translated: Izinqubo ezikhiqiza i-aerosol zifaka phakathi ukungena ngaphakathi, izinqubo zokungenisa ukukhwehlela, ama-bronchoscopies, ezinye izinqubo nezivivinyo zamazinyo, noma ukuqoqwa kwesifanekiso esihlaselayo.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Imisebenzi yasemakhazeni yokuchayeka esifweni enobungozi kakhulu ihlanganisa izisebenzi ezihileleke ekulungiseleleni izidumbu zabantu abanezigameko ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi bane-COVID-19 lapho befa; lezi ziba ubungozi obukhulu kakhulu uma zihlola izidumbu. Izilawuli ezengeziwe zonjiniyela zala maqembu obungozi zihlanganisa amagumbi okuhlaliswa wedwa eziguli ezaziwayo noma okunezinsolo zokuthi zine-COVID-19, okuhlanganisa lapho kwenziwa izinqubo zokusungulwa kwe-aerosol.
translated: Imisebenzi emakhazeni asengozini enkulu yokuchayeka ihlanganisa abasebenzi ababandakanyekayo ekulungiseni izidumbu zabantu ababazi noma abasola amacala e-COVID-19 ngesikhathi beshona; lezi ziba sengozini enkulu yokuchayeka uma zenza ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu.Izilawuli zobunjiniyela ezengeziwe zala maqembu asengozini zihlanganisa amagumbi okuhlala ngawodwa ezigulini ezine-COVID-19 ezaziwa noma ezisolwayo, okuhlanganisa nokuthi kwenziwa nini izinqubo zokukhiqiza i-aerosol.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Ukungena komoya okukhethekile ngomfutho onegathivu kungafaneleka kwamanye amasethingi ezokwelashwa nawasemakhazeni.
translated: Ukungena komoya okukhethekile okungalungile kungase kufaneke kwezinye izilungiselelo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo nezindawo zokugcina izidumbu.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Amasampula kufanele asingathwe ngeziqondiso zokuphepha ze-Biosafety Level 3.
translated: Izibonelo kufanele ziphathwe ngezinyathelo zokuphepha ze-Biosafety Level 3.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: I-World Health Organization (WHO) ikhuthaza ukuba iziguli ezifikayo zihlukaniswe zifakwe ezindaweni zokulinda ezihlukile kuye ngokuthi kunezinsolo yini zokuthi zine-COVID-19. Ngaphezu kwenye i-PPE, i-OSHA ikhuthaza ama-respirator kulabo abasebenza beqhelelene ngamafithi angu-6 neziguli ezaziwayo, noma okunezinsolo, zokuthi zinegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2, nalabo abenza izinqubo ezisungula i-aerosol.
translated: I-World Health Organisation (WHO) incoma ukuthi iziguli ezingenayo zihlukaniselwe ezindaweni ezihlukile zokulinda kuye ngokuthi kusolwa icala le-COVID-19. Ngaphezu kwenye i-PPE, i-OSHA incoma ama-respirators alabo abasebenza phakathi kwamamitha ayi-6 eziguli ezaziwa ngokuthi , noma okusolwa ukuthi ungenwe yi-SARS-CoV-2, kanye nalabo abenza izinqubo zokukhiqiza i-aerosol.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: E-United States, ama-respirator ayisembozo sobuso esihlungayo e-N95 agunyazwe yi-NIOSH noma angcono kunawo kumelwe asetshenziswe njengendlela yohlelo lokuzivikela ngama-respirator olubhaliwe oluphelele, olubandakanya ukuhlolwa kokuba umqemane, ukuzivocavoca, nokuhlolwa kwezokwelashwa.
translated: E-United States, izipumuli ezicwengayo ze-N95 ezigunyazwe i-NIOSH noma okungcono kufanele zisetshenziswe kumongo wohlelo oluphelele, olubhaliwe lokuvikela ukuphefumula oluhlanganisa ukuhlola ukufaneleka, ukuqeqeshwa, nezivivinyo zezokwelapha.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Ezinye izinhlobo zama-respirator zingavikela kakhudlwana futhi zithuthukise ukuphatheka kahle kwesisebenzi. I-WHO ayiwakhuthazi ama-coveralls, ngoba i-COVID-19 iyisifo esingena ngokuhogelwa hhayi ngokudluliselwa ngoketshezi olusemzimbeni.
translated: Ezinye izinhlobo zemishini yokuphefumula zinganikeza ukuvikeleka okukhulu futhi zithuthukise ukunethezeka kwezisebenzi. I-WHO ayincomi amakhava, njengoba i-COVID-19 iyisifo sokuphefumula kunokuba isakazwe ngoketshezi lomzimba.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: I-WHO ikhuthaza kuphela imaski yokuhlinza ezisebenzini ezihlungayo ezindaweni okungenwa kuzo.
translated: I-WHO incoma imaski yokuhlinzwa kuphela yabasebenzi abahlola indawo yokungena.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Kulabo abaqongelela amasampula okuhogela, abanakekela, noma abahambisa iziguli ze-COVID-19 ngaphandle kwezinqubo zokusungula i-aerosol, i-WHO ikhuthaza imaski yokuhlinza, izibuko, noma i-face shield, igawuni, namagilavu.
translated: Kulabo abaqoqa izibonelo zokuphefumula ezivela, ezinakekela, noma ezithutha iziguli ze-COVID-19 ngaphandle kwezinqubo ezikhiqiza i-aerosol, i-WHO incoma imaski yokuhlinzwa, izibuko, noma isihlangu sobuso, ingubo, namagilavu.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Uma kwenziwa inqubo yokusungula i-aerosol, kufakwa i-N95 noma i-respirator ye-FFP2 esikhundleni semaski yokuhlinza.
translated: Uma kwenziwa inqubo ekhiqiza i-aerosol, imaskhi yokuhlinza ithathelwa indawo i-N95 noma i-FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Ngenxa yokuthi i-PPE ayitholakali ngokwanele emhlabeni, i-WHO ikhuthaza ukunciphisa isidingo se-PPE ngokuxhumana neziguli ngocingo, izivimbeli ezingokoqobo njengamafasitela abonisa ngale, okuvumela kuphela labo abahileleke ngokuqondile ekwelapheni ukuba bangene egunjini elinesiguli esine-COVID-19, basebenzise kuphela i-PPE edingekayo emsebenzini othile, baqhubeke besebenzisa i-respirator efanayo ngaphandle kokuyikhipha kuyilapho benakekela iziguli eziningi ezinesifo esifanayo, beqapha futhi belawula ukutholakala kwe-PPE, futhi benqabela ukusetshenziswa kwamamaski kubantu abangenazimpawu zesifo.
translated: Njengoba kunikezwe ukuthi ukunikezwa komhlaba wonke kwe-PPE akwanele, i-WHO incoma ukuthi kuncishiswe isidingo se-PPE nge-telemedicine, izithiyo zomzimba ezifana namafasitela acacile, okuvumela kuphela labo abathintekayo ekunakekelweni okuqondile ukuthi bangene egumbini elinesiguli se-COVID-19, besebenzisa i-PPE edingekayo kuphela. ngomsebenzi othize, ukuqhubeka nokusetshenziswa komshini wokuphefumula ofanayo ngaphandle kokuwususa kuyilapho unakekela iziguli eziningi ezinokuxilongwa okufanayo, ukuqapha kanye nokuxhumanisa uchungechunge lokuhlinzeka nge-PPE, futhi kungakhuthazi ukusetshenziswa kwemaski kubantu abangenazimpawu.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: IVELA KU-: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
translated: KUSUKA: U-Katherine Maher, i-CEO ye-Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: IYA: Kuzo zonke izisebenzi ze-Wikimedia Foundation
translated: TO: Bonke abasebenzi be-Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: IPHATHELENE: [Covid-19] Ukunciphisa umthwalo nokulungela isikhathi esizayo
translated: UMUGQA WESIHLOKO: [Covid-19] Ikhanyisa umthwalo futhi ilungiselela ikusasa

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: USUKU/ISIKHATHI SOKUTHUMELA: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
translated: THUMELA USUKU/ISIKHATHI: 14 Mashi, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: ILAYISENSI: CC0: Awekho amalungelo agodliwe
translated: ILAYISENSI: CC0: Awekho amalungelo agodliwe

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Sizithola sisesimweni esiphawulekayo kule nyanga.
translated: Sizithola sisezimeni ezimangalisayo kule nyanga.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Umqedazwe we-COVID-19 uyinto eyenza icace indlela abantu emhlabeni abaxhumene ngayo nomthwalo esinawo komunye nomunye.
translated: Umqedazwe we-COVID-19 uyinto eyenza kucace ukuxhumana kwethu kwabantu emhlabeni wonke kanye nezibopho esinazo komunye nomunye.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Asikaze sibhekane nezinselele ezifuze lena, kodwa siyazi ukuthi indlela esisabela ngayo ixhomeke ohlotsheni lokuzwelana emhlabeni, ukusebenzelana kahle, nokwakhiwa komphakathi okungumgogodla wale nhlangano.
translated: Asinaso isibonelo sezinselele zayo, kodwa siyazi ukuthi impendulo yethu engcono kakhulu incike ohlotsheni lozwela lomhlaba wonke, ukubambisana, nokwakhiwa komphakathi okusenhliziyweni yale nhlangano.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Ukubambisana nokunakekelana esikubonile kuzo zonke izisebenzi zethu ngama-imeyili, izingcingo, nezingxoxo kuyisiqinisekiso esiphawulekayo sokuthi sinabantu abahle esinenhlanhla yokusebenza nabo.
translated: Ukuzwana nokunakekela esikubonile kubo bonke ozakwethu nge-imeyili, izingcingo, nezingxoxo kuwukuqinisekisa okumangalisayo kwabantu abamangalisayo esinenhlanhla yokusebenza nabo.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Ngiyajabula ngempela futhi ngiyaziqhenya ngokusebenza kanye nani.
translated: Angikwazanga ukubonga nokuziqhenya ngokunibala nonke njengozakwethu.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Ngeviki elidlule, othile wangitshela awazisa ngayo umsebenzi wethu.
translated: Ngesonto eledlule, othile wabelane nami ngokwazisa kwakhe ngomsebenzi wethu.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Wangikhumbuza indlela okunengqondo ngayo ngomhlaba ukuba ukwazi ukuvula i-Wikipedia njengamanje, futhi lolu uphawu olunamandla ngalo mthombo osemqoka ukuba uhlale utholakala ku-inthanethi futhi utholakala kuwo wonke umuntu.
translated: Bangikhumbuze ukuthi kunengqondo kangakanani ukuthi umhlaba ukwazi ukuphendukela ku-Wikipedia njengamanje, nokuthi kuwuphawu olunamandla kangakanani kulo mthombo obalulekile ukuthi uhlale ku-inthanethi futhi utholakale kubo bonke.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Umsebenzi wenu wenza lokhu kwenzeke, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi nigcina amasayithi evulekile noma izisebenzi zethu zikhokhelwe noma imiphakathi yethu ivikelekile.
translated: Umsebenzi wakho wenza lokhu kwenzeke, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ugcina amasayithi ehlala njalo noma ozakwethu bekhokhelwa noma imiphakathi yethu iphephile.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Umhlaba uyaludinga ulwazi olutholakala ku-Wikipedia, manje kunanini ngaphambili.
translated: Umhlaba udinga ulwazi olunikezwa yi-Wikipedia, manje kunangaphambili.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Lesi yisikhathi lapho kungekhona kuphela lokho esikwenzayo, kodwa nendlela esikwenza ngayo, okuzoba negalelo elinamandla emhlabeni.
translated: Lesi yisikhathi lapho hhayi esikwenzayo kuphela, kodwa ukuthi sikwenza kanjani, kuzokwenza umthelela obonakalayo emhlabeni.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Ngenxa yokubaluleka kwalo msebenzi nendima yenu kuwo, sizokwenza izinguquko ezinkulu endleleni esisebenzelana ngayo, kusukela evikini elizayo.
translated: Ngenxa yokubaluleka kwalo msebenzi kanye neqhaza lakho kuwo, sizokwenza izinguquko ezibalulekile endleleni esisebenzisana ngayo, kusukela kuleli sonto elizayo.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Izinguquko emsebenzini wethu namashejuli
translated: Ukulungiswa komsebenzi wethu namashejuli

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Njengoba uRobyn eshilo ngaphambilini, ithimba-c liye lahlangana izolo kusihlwa laxoxa ngendlela esizosebenza ngayo neshejuli yethu yezinsuku nezinyanga ezizayo.
translated: Njengoba u-Robyn ashilo ngaphambili, ithimba le-c-team lihlangane izolo ebusuku ukuze lixoxe ngendlela yethu nohlelo lwethu lwezinsuku nezinyanga ezizayo.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Kuleyo ngxoxo, siye sacabangela lokho esibe nomuzwa wokuthi kuzoba ukusabela kahle kulokho esibhekene nakho nendlela engcono kakhulu yokugcina inhlangano iqhubeka phakathi nalesi sikhathi.
translated: Kuleyo ngxoxo, sicabangele lokho ebesicabanga ukuthi kungaba impendulo efanele kulokho esibhekene nakho kanye nendlela engcono kakhulu yokugcina inhlangano izinzile ngalesi sikhathi.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Singalindele besifuna ukususa ukucindezeleka futhi sisekele umgomo wethu wenkathi ende.
translated: Besifuna kakhulu ukususa ingcindezi futhi sisekele umsebenzi wethu wesikhathi eside.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Uma kudingeka uphinde usishayele, kulungile.
translated: Uma udinga ukuphinda ushayele, kulungile.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Kuzo zonke izisebenzi, izinkampane zenkontileka, nezisebenzi zenkontileka:
translated: Kubo bonke abasebenzi, osonkontileka, nabasebenzi bezinkontileka:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: umsebenzi wethu olindelekile wansuku zonke uzoba amahora angaba ngu-4 ngosuku, noma amahora angu-20 ngeviki kuze kumenyezelwe ushintsho.
translated: esikulindele nsuku zonke ukusebenza kuyoba amahora angaba ngu-4 ngosuku, noma amahora angu-20 ngesonto kuze kube yilapho sithola esinye isaziso.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Asimemezeli iholidi - uma ukwazi ukusebenza amahora avamile engeziwe, inkampane ingakusebenzisa.
translated: Asilimemezeli iholide - uma ukwazi ukusebenza amahora amaningi ajwayelekile, i-mission ingakusebenzisa.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Nokho, izinto aziqinisekile emhlabeni manje, futhi kungakhathaliseki ukuthi kudingeka unakekele abantu obathandayo, uthenge ukudla, noma uye kwadokotela, impilo yakho iza kuqala kithi.
translated: Kodwa-ke, izwe alibikezeleki njengamanje, futhi noma ngabe udinga ukunakekela obathandayo, ukuthola igrosa, noma ukuya kudokotela, inhlalakahle yakho iyona nto eza kuqala kithi.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Ngeke sisilandelele isikhathi osisebenzayo.
translated: Asilandeleli isikhathi sakho.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Uma ugula, ungasebenzi.
translated: Uma ugula, ungasebenzi.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Asikho ngempela isidingo sokukusho lokhu, kodwa sizokusho.
translated: Lokhu kufanele kuhambe ngaphandle kokusho, kodwa siyakusho.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Akudingeki ufake izinsuku zokugula noma i-PTO - uzomane utshele imenenja yakho futhi usize ithimba osebenza nalo ukuba lihlele kabusha amakhalenda namashejuli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izingxenye ezisemqoka zomsebenzi ziyafezwa.
translated: Azikho izinsuku zokugula noma i-PTO edingekayo - vele utshele umphathi wakho futhi usize ithimba lakho libuyekeze amakhalenda namashejuli ukuze uqiniseke ukuthi izindawo ezibalulekile zomsebenzi ziyakhava.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Uma kutholakala ukuthi unegciwane le-COVID-19, sicela utshele uBryan phakathi kwama-T&C Ops ukuze i-T&C ikwazi ukusiza ngokusekela futhi iqinisekise ukuthi isimo sakho sinakekelwa abaphathi ngendlela efanele).
translated: (Uma kutholakala ukuthi une-COVID-19, sicela wazise uBryan ongaphakathi kwe-T&C Ops ukuze i-T&C ikusize ngokwesekwa futhi uqiniseke ukuthi isimo sakho sithola ukunakwa okufanele kubaphathi).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Izisebenzi ezisebenza ngamahora zizokhokhelwa ngokugcwele.
translated: Abantu ngehora bazokhokhelwa ngokugcwele.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Kakade sishilo, futhi siyazijuba ukuba sifeze izibopho zethu ezisebenzini zethu zenkontileka nalezo ezisebenza ngamahora.
translated: Sesishilo kakade, futhi siphinde sizibophezele ukuhlonipha izibopho zethu kosonkontileka bethu nabasebenzi esisebenza nabo njalo ngehora.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Wonke umuntu uzokhokhelwa ngokwamahora akhe avamile abewasebenza ezimweni ezivamile.
translated: Wonke umuntu uzokhokhelwa ngesisekelo samahora akhe ajwayelekile asetshenzwe ngezimo ezijwayelekile.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Lokhu kuhlanganisa nalapho ugula futhi ungakwazi ukusebenza.
translated: Lokhu kubandakanya uma ugula futhi ungakwazi ukusebenza.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Uma ufuna ukusebenza, siyakusekela.
translated: Uma ufuna ukusebenza, siyakweseka.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Abantu abaningi basebenzisa umsebenzi njengendlela yokwenza ukucindezeleka kwabo kuhambisane nezinto ezisizungezile.
translated: Abantu abaningi basebenzisa umsebenzi njengendlela yokuhambisa ukucindezeleka kwabo nomhlaba osizungezile.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Esikwenzayo kungaba nomvuzo oyingqayizivele, ikakhulukazi ezikhathini ezinjengalesi.
translated: Esikwenzayo kungaba okuvuza ngendlela emangalisayo, ikakhulukazi ngezikhathi ezinjengalezi.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Siyaphinda futhi, kubalulekile ukuba uzinakekele.
translated: Futhi, lokhu kumayelana nokuzinakekela kwakho.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Sikucela ukuba uxhumane nemenenja yakho, ukuze sazi lokho esingakulindela futhi sihlele ngokuvumelana nakho.
translated: Esikucelayo ukuthi uxhumane nomphathi wakho, ukuze sazi ukuthi yini okufanele siyilindele futhi singalungisa ngokufanele.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Omunye umsebenzi ubhekwa njengosemqoka.
translated: Omunye umsebenzi uthathwa njengobalulekile.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Kunezinto okumelwe siqhubeke sizenza.
translated: Kunezinto okumele siqhubeke sizenza.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Amathimba e-SRE, e-HR Ops, e-Trust & Safety, nawe-Fundraising (phakathi kwamanye) enza umsebenzi obucayi ongase udinge ukusekelwa okwengeziwe.
translated: Amaqembu e-SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, kanye ne-Furaising (phakathi kokunye) enza umsebenzi obalulekile ongadinga ukwesekwa okwengeziwe.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Sizoqala inqubo nayo yonke iminyango ukuze sihlole imigomo yamanje futhi sigudluzele ukugxila kwethu ekusekeleni lokho okubalulekile emgomweni wethu.
translated: Sizoqala inqubo nayo yonke iminyango ukuze sihlole izinjongo zamanje futhi siguqule ukugxila kwethu ekusekeleni lokho okubalulekile kunjongo yethu.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Kuningi sonke okufanele sikwenze, sizomane sigxile sonke kumaphrojekthi asemqoka kakhulu.
translated: Kuningi okumele sikwenzele sonke, sizogxila nje kumaphrojekthi abaluleke kakhulu.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Ukunciphisa ijubane manje ngeke kusilimaze kamuva.
translated: Ukunensa manje ngeke kubuhlungu ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Asihleli “ukusebenza ngokuphindiwe ukuze sibambe ishejuli” lapho umqedazwe usudlulile.
translated: Asihlele ukuya “isikhathi esikabili ukuze sithole” uma ubhubhane seludlulile.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Ngeke kulindeleke ukuba usebenze amahora engeziwe ukuze uqede umsebenzi ngesikhathi esingavamile kwamanje.
translated: Ngeke ulindeleke ukuthi usebenze amahora engeziwe ukuze uhlangabezane nezinsuku eziwumnqamulajuqu osekusengenzeka ukuthi azinangqondo.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Siyakwamukela ukuthi izimo zishintshile, futhi sizosebenzela ekubekeni imigomo nezikhathi ezintsha lapho kufaneleka khona.
translated: Siyakwamukela ukuthi izimo zishintshile, futhi sizosebenza ukuze simise okuhlosiwe okusha nezikhathi lapho kufanele khona.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Kwenzekani nge-APP (i-Annual Planning)?
translated: Kwenzekani nge-APP (Uhlelo Lonyaka)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Ukuze ushintshele ezimweni zethu ezintsha nasemahoreni omsebenzi esiwalindele nsuku zonke, sihlose ukushintsha inkathi yokuthunyelwa kwe-Annual Plan yethu ka-2020-2021.
translated: Ukuze sizivumelanise neqiniso lethu elisha kanye nesilindelwe yihora lokusebenza nsuku zonke, sihlose ukulungisa umugqa wesikhathi wokulethwa koHlelo lwethu Lonyaka lwango-2020-2021.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Inhloso yethu iwukusikisela ukwelulwa kohlelo lwethu lwango-2019-2020 oluvumela isikhathi esengeziwe sokwenza ibhajethi yokuvumela izisebenzi ukuba zenze imisebenzi ebucayi kuqala, zizinakekele zona, futhi zinakekele abantu ezibathandayo kuyilapho zisiza nalabo abadinga noma abafisa ukusebenza ishejuli encishisiwe emavikini ambalwa azayo.
translated: Inhloso yethu ukuphakamisa ukwelulwa kohlelo lwethu luka-2019-2020 oluvumela isikhathi esengeziwe sokwenza isabelomali ukuze sivumele abasebenzi ukuthi babeke phambili umsebenzi obalulekile, ukuzinakekela, nokunakekela abathandekayo kuyilapho kwamukela labo abadinga noma abafisa ukusebenza isimiso esincishisiwe esikhathini emasontweni ambalwa ezayo.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Lokhu kwelulwa kwenkathi yokusebenza inciphisa kakhulu umsebenzi ohlelelwe manje nengcindezi ekuyo yonke inhlangano.
translated: Lesi sandiso somugqa wesikhathi sinciphisa kakhulu imithwalo yamanje yokuhlela kanye nengcindezi kuyo yonke inhlangano.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Sizokwethula lokho esikuhlongozayo kuBhodi ngeviki elizayo futhi sibuyekeze abameleli namathimba ezinyathelweni ezilandelayo ngokushesha nje lapho sesinesiqinisekiso.
translated: Sizokwethula isiphakamiso sethu eBhodini ngesonto elizayo futhi sizobuyekeza izithunywa namathimba ngezinyathelo ezilandelayo ngokushesha nje lapho sesithole isiqinisekiso.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Siyalibonga ithimba le-APP ngokuhola kulokhu.
translated: Sibonga ithimba le-APP ngobuholi bakho kulokhu.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Isimo sehhovisi, ukuchayeka, nokuhlanza
translated: Isimo sehhovisi, ukuchayeka, nokuhlanza

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Ngeviki elidlule, sifunde ukuthi esinye isisebenzi sethu esiyi-SF kungenzeka sichayeke egciwaneni le-COVID-19.
translated: Ngesonto eledlule, sifunde ukuthi omunye wozakwethu abazinze ku-SF kungenzeka ukuthi uke wachayeka egciwaneni le-COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Nokho, ngenxa yokukhathazeka okukhulu, sithumele iqembu elihlanza ngokususa amagciwane ukuba lisuse amagciwane kuzo zonke izindawo zehhovisi lase-San Francisco.
translated: Kodwa-ke, ngenxa yokuqapha okukhulu, saqasha iqembu elihlanza amagciwane ukuthi libulale amagciwane kuzo zonke izindawo ezisehhovisi laseSan Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Lisebenzise insipho yasezibhedlela eyisibulali-magciwane ukuze lisuse amagciwane yonke indawo, kanye nasendaweni yokwamukela izivakashi nasezindaweni zama-elevator ezingenela endaweni esikuyo.
translated: Basebenzise isisombululo se-anti-viral sezinga lasesibhedlela ukuze babulale amagciwane kuyo yonke indawo, kanye nendawo yokwamukela izivakashi kanye namabhange amakheshi angena esitezi sethu.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Isakhiwo sisebenzisa iphrothokholi yaso yokunakekelwa ngokusebenzisa imikhiqizo esekela ukuphepha kwamathenenti aso.
translated: Lesi sakhiwo sisebenzisa iphrothokholi yaso yomsebenzi wokunakekela sisebenzisa imikhiqizo esekela ukuphepha kwabaqashi babo.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Sizizwa sikhululekile ukuthi ihhovisi lizobe selilungile lapho sesinquma ukuphindela kulo.
translated: Sizizwa sikhululekile ukuthi ihhovisi lizobe selilungiselelwe kahle lapho sinquma ukubuya.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Ihhovisi lethu le-DC lise-WeWork, elabelene nathi iphrothokholi yalo ye-COVID-19 kanye nazo zonke izisebenzi ezise-DC.
translated: Ihhovisi lethu le-DC lisendaweni ye-WeWork, eye yabelane ngesivumelwano sayo se-COVID-19 nathi kanye nawo wonke amalungu ezisebenzi ezizinze e-DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Kusukela ngeviki elidlule, ihhovisi lethu le-DC lithuthele endaweni eqhelile esethwe ngokuphelele ngokuvumelana nesiqondiso esinikezwe i-San Francisco.
translated: Kusukela ngeviki eledlule, ihhovisi lethu le-DC lithuthele ekusetheni okukude ngokugcwele ngokuhambisana nesiqondiso esabiwe ne-San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Njengoba ezinye izisebenzi zethu zase-NYC zazi, besilokhu sixoxa ngokuqasha indawo e-Brooklyn.
translated: Njengoba abanye ozakwethu abazinze e-NYC bazi, sike saxoxa futhi mayelana nokuqasha indawo eBrooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Lezi zingxoxo ziyaqhubeka kodwa zingase zithathe isikhathi.
translated: Lezi zingxoxo ziyaqhubeka kodwa zingase zibambezeleke.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Ezinye izisebenzi zethu zisebenzela kude okokuqala ngqa.
translated: Abanye ozakwethu basebenza bekude okokuqala ngqa.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Izisebenzi zethu ezinesikhathi eside zisebenzela kude ziyazi ukuthi kungaba ushintsho olukhulu, futhi zifuna ukuninika icebiso:
translated: Ozakwethu abasebenzisa isikhathi eside bekude bayazi ukuthi kungaba wushintsho, futhi bebefuna ukukunikeza izeluleko ezithile:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Nciphisani ubude bemihlangano ibe okungenani yihora elilodwa noma amabili.
translated: Khawulela ubude bemihlangano ukuthi bube okungenani ngamanani ehora elilodwa noma amabili.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Uma kudingeka imihlangano emide, cabangelani indlela eningayihlukanisa ngayo phakathi nezinsuku eziningana.
translated: Uma izikhathi ezinde zidingeka, cabanga ukuthi zingahlukaniswa kanjani phakathi nezinsuku ezimbalwa.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Chazani ngokucacile ukuthi umhlangano umayelana nani, yibani ne-agenda, futhi nithumele izinto okufanele zifundwe kusenesikhathi.
translated: Chaza ngokusobala umhlangano, yiba ne-ajenda, futhi uthumele izincwadi zokufunda kusenesikhathi.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Wenzeni njalo ngevidiyo, ngamathuluzi anjenge-Google Docs ne-Zoom ukuze nisebenze futhi nixhumane bukhoma.
translated: Yenza ividiyo ibe yinto ezenzakalelayo, ngamathuluzi afana ne-Google Amadokhumenti ne-Zoom ukuze uqhubekisele phambili ukusebenzisana okubukhoma nokuxhumana.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Yibani nomuntu ozohola ukuze ahlele yonke imihlangano, othile ozobheka imibuzo ezingxoxweni futhi alandelele uhlu lwabazokhuluma, nothile ozosiza ekubhaleni amanothi (noma nibhale amanothi ninonke).
translated: Yiba nomholi wokuqhuba yonke imihlangano, othile ozoqapha ingxoxo ukuze athole imibuzo futhi alandelele uhlu lwezipikha, kanye nomuntu ongasiza ekuthatheni amanothi (noma ukuthatha amanothi ngokubambisana).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Thumelani i-imeyili kwabasekela ngezobuchwepheshe uma nidinga ihedisethi ekahle.
translated: Thumela i-imeyili kusekelo lobuchwepheshe uma udinga ihedisethi enethezekile.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Sebenzisani imali yenu yenhlalakahle ekuthengeni okuhlafunwayo.
translated: Sebenzisa imbuyiselo yakho yezempilo ukuze uthole ukudla okulula.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Joyinani ishaneli ethi #remoties ku-Slack ukuze nixoxe nozakwenu ngomsebenzi othunyelwayo
translated: Joyina isiteshi se-#remoties ku-Slack ukuze ukhulume nozakwenu mayelana nomsebenzi osabalalisiwe

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ithimba le-HR Operations lifuna isiqondiso kumasemina e-inthanethi ngezindlela eziphumelelayo zokusebenza ukuze kusekelwe ukwanda emsebenzini othunyelwayo kuyo yonke Inkampane.
translated: Ithimba le-HR Operations libheka isiqondiso se-ergonomics esekwe kuwebhu ukuze sisekele ukwanda komsebenzi osabalalisiwe kuyo yonke iSisekelo.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Kuleli viki elidlule sicele bonke abamukela imali yeqolo emphakathini ukuba bakhansele izenzakalo zomphakathi ezixhaswa yi-Wikimedia, njengama-editathons, i-WHO ize imemezele ukuthi lo mqedazwe usuphelile.
translated: Kuleli sonto eledlule sicele bonke abathola izibonelelo zomphakathi ukuthi bakhansele imicimbi yomphakathi exhaswe yi-Wikimedia, efana ne-editathons, kuze kube i-WHO imemezela ukuthi lolu bhubhane seluphelile.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Sizobatshela ukuthi siye saqonda ukuthi isicelo sethu sokukhansela neminye imingcele ingenza kungenzeki ukuqedela imisebenzi yabo yemali yeqolo okuvunyelenwe ngayo nokuthi akekho ozohlawuliswa ngokwephuza noma ukushintsha leyo migomo.
translated: Sabazisa ukuthi siyaqonda ukuthi isicelo sethu sokukhansela neminye imikhawulo singenza kungenzeki ukuqeda imisebenzi yabo yesibonelelo sikahulumeni abavumelene ngayo nokuthi akekho ozojeziswa ngokubambezeleka noma ukulungisa leyo migomo.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Kuleli viki elizayo sizolandelela ngesinye isiqondiso ku-Wikimania namanye amakhonferensi omphakathi esifundazwe kanye nawezigaba.
translated: Kuleli sonto elizayo sizolandela ngesiqondiso esengeziwe nge-Wikimania nezinye izingqungquthela zomphakathi zesifunda nezinezihloko.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Umuzwa ovamile womphakathi emhlabeni ubonakala uwukudangala ngokuphazamiseka kodwa ukukhululeka ngokucaciselwa namathuba okugxila emiphakathini yabo, i-Wikimedia kanye nokunye.
translated: Umbono ojwayelekile ovela emphakathini womhlaba wonke ubonakala uwukudabuka kokuphazamiseka kodwa ukukhululeka ekucaciseni kanye nekhono lokugxila emiphakathini yabo, i-Wikimedia nokunye.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, i-CRT isebenzela ukusetha ikhasi ku-Meta-Wiki ukuze kunikezwe isikhala somphakathi ukuze ubheke igalelo elibe khona futhi ulandele izingxoxo zethu nawo.
translated: Ukuqhubekela phambili, i-CRT isebenzela ukumisa ikhasi ku-Meta-Wiki ukuze kunikezwe umphakathi indawo yokuqapha umthelela futhi ulandele ukuxhumana kwethu nawo.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Ukuhlala sixhumene ngezindaba ezihlobene ne-COVID-19
translated: Ukuhlala uthintana nezindaba ezihlobene ne-COVID-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Sizothumela isimemo kumakhalenda akho ngoLwesine oluzayo, ngo-14:00 UTC/07:00 PT somhlangano okhethekile wezisebenzi.
translated: Sizothumela isimemo ekhalendeni lakho ngoLwesine oluzayo, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT somhlangano okhethekile wabasebenzi.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Sizosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukuze sabelane ngezinye izibuyekezo, siphendule imibuzo yakho futhi sichithe isikhathi esithile sixhumana.
translated: Sizosebenzisa lesi sikhathi ukwabelana ngezibuyekezo ezengeziwe, siphendule imibuzo yakho futhi sichithe isikhathi esithile sixhumana sodwa.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Sisebenza ndawonye futhi sizokusiza nomaphi lapho sikwazi khona.
translated: Sindawonye kulokhu futhi silapha ukuze sisize ngendlela esingakwazi ngayo.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Okwamanje, ungaqhubeka uthola ulwazi kule imeyili, nalo lonke olunye ulwazi olusemqoka lwe-COVID-19 oluhlobene, ku-Office Wiki.
translated: Okwamanje, ungaqhubeka nokuthola ulwazi kule imeyili, kanye nalo lonke olunye ulwazi olubalulekile oluhlobene ne-COVID-19, ku-Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: I-CRT izogcina la makhasi ebuyekeziwe nalo lonke ulwazi lusendaweni eyodwa.
translated: I-CRT izogcina la makhasi evuselelwe kanye nalo lonke ulwazi endaweni eyodwa.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Siyasebenza futhi ukuze sigcine ukuxhumana kwasikhathi sonke nezisebenzi ezihlala emazweni okwamanje athinteke kakhulu.
translated: Siphinde sisebenzele ukugcina ukuxhumana njalo nabasebenzi abahlala emazweni athinteke kakhulu njengamanje.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Uma unemibuzo ngokuhamba, izenzakalo, umzila womsebenzi omkhulu, inselele yekhavareji, nanoma yini enye ongase udinge usizo kuyo, sicela unganqikazi ukutshela futhi usebenze ne-CRT.
translated: Uma unanoma yimiphi imibuzo mayelana nohambo, imicimbi, ukusakazwa komsebenzi omkhulu, noma inselele yokuhlanganisa, nanoma yini enye ongase udinge usizo ngayo, sicela ungangabazi ukwazisa nokusebenzisana ne-CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Silapha ukuze sisize ekusekeleni nasekuxhumaniseni uma kudingeka.
translated: Silapha ukuze sisize ukuhlinzeka ngosekelo nokuxhumana njengoba kudingeka.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Uma unendaba eyimfihlo noma ebucayi, sicela uthumele i-imeyili kuBryan Judan - Umqondisi we-HR International Global Operations.
translated: Uma unodaba oluyimfihlo noma olubucayi, sicela uthumele i-imeyili ku-Bryan Judan - Umqondisi we-HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Azikho kulezi zinguquko okufanele zibhekwe njengokushiya umsebenzi nezibopho zethu.
translated: Alukho kulezi zinguquko okufanele lubhekwe njengokushiya umsebenzi nezibopho zethu.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Kunalokho, ziwukuqaphela ukuthi kulesi sikhathi, umsebenzi nezibopho zethu cishe kuzodinga ukuvunyelaniswa ngendlela engakaze ibe khona ngaphambili.
translated: Kunalokho, ziwukuqaphela ukuthi njengamanje, umsebenzi nezibopho zethu cishe kuyodingeka zivumelane nezimo ngendlela esingazange sizivumelanise ngayo esikhathini esidlule.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Lezi izinyathelo ezikholelwa ukuthi ziyadingeka ukuze sisekelane ukuze siqhubeke nomsebenzi, sinikeze iqembu lethu ukusekela elikudingayo, nomhlaba siwunike isevisi othembele kuyo.
translated: Lezi yizinyathelo esikholelwa ukuthi ziyadingeka ukuze sisekelane ukuze siqhubeke nokusebenza, sinikeze umbutho wethu ukusekelwa abakudingayo, kanye nomhlaba ngenkonzo abathembele kuyo.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Umsebenzi esiwuhlelile uzobe usilindile uma isikhathi sifika.
translated: Umsebenzi wethu esiwuhlelile uzobe ulapho usilindile uma kufika isikhathi.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Okwamanje, yisikhathi sokusekelana futhi kwakhiwe isikhala somsebenzi obalulekile ongase ube khona emavikini kanye nasezinyangeni ezizayo.
translated: Okwamanje, sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sisekelane futhi sakhe indawo yomsebenzi obalulekile ozofika emasontweni kanye nasezinyangani ezizayo.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Sidinga ukuba nonke nikwenze kwenzeke lokho, ngakho sidinga ukuba nonke nizinakekele nina nemindeni yenu ukuze nibe senikulungele ngokugcwele lapho isidingo siphakama.
translated: Sidinga nonke ukuba nenze lokho kwenzeke, ngakho-ke sidinga ukuthi nonke nizinakekele kanye nemindeni yenu ukuze nibe sesimweni esingcono kakhulu lapho kunesidingo.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Manje, siyacela -- gezani izandla zenu futhi ningazithinti ebusweni!
translated: Manje, ngicela -- ugeze izandla zakho futhi ungathinti ubuso bakho!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
