targetString: Ngomhla ka-27 February 2020, inkampane esizayo ye-Generex, i-NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, imemezele ukuthi isiqala iphrojekthi yokugoma ukuze kwakhiwe umgomo we-peptide ye-Ii-Key ngokumelene ne-COVID-19.
translated: Ngomhla zingama-27 kuFebhuwari 2020, inkampani engaphansi kwe-Generex, i-NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, yamemezela ukuthi baqala iphrojekthi yokugoma yokwakha umuthi wokugomela i-Ii-Key peptide ngokumelene ne-COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Bebefuna ukukhiqiza umgomo obungahlolwa kubantu "phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-90."
translated: Babefuna ukukhiqiza ikhandidethi lokugoma elingase lihlolwe kubantu "zingakapheli izinsuku ezingama-90."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-5 March 2020, iWashington University eSt. Louis yamemezela amaphrojekthi ayo okusungula umgomo.
translated: Ngomhla zi-5 kuNdasa wezi-2020, iYunivesithi yaseWashington e-St. Louis yamemezela amaphrojekthi ayo wokwenza umuthi wokugoma.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-5 March 2020, i-United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command eFort Detrick neWalter Reed Army Institute of Research eSilver Spring, zombili ezisentshonalanga yeMaryland, zamemezela ukuthi zisungula umgomo.
translated: Ngomhla zi-5 kuNdasa wezi-2020, i-United States Army Medical Research kanye ne-Materiel Command e-Fort Detrick kanye ne-Walter Reed Army Institute of Research e-Silver Spring, entshonalanga ne-Maryland, bamemezele ukuthi basebenzela umgomo.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Ngawomhla ka-10 March 2020, i-Emergent Biosolutions yamemezela ukuthi isibambisene ne-Novavax Inc.
translated: Cishe mhla ziyi-10 kuNdasa 2020, i-Emergent Biosolutions yamemezela ukuthi ibambisene neNovavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: ekusunguleni nasekwakheni umgomo.
translated: ekuthuthukisweni nasekukhiqizeni umgomo.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Abalingane baphinde bamemezela izinhlelo zokuhlolwa kwangaphambi kokwelashwa kanye nocwaningo lokwelashwa lweSigaba I ngo-July 2020.
translated: Ozakwethu baphinde bamemezela izinhlelo zokuhlolwa ngaphambi komtholampilo kanye nokuhlolwa komtholampilo kweSigaba I ngoJulayi 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-12 March 2020, i-Health Ministry yase-India yamemezela ukuthi isebenza ngabantu abahlukaniswe nomphakathi abangu-11, nokuthi ngisho ingashesha kanjani kungathatha okungenani unyaka nohhafu kuya eminyakeni emibili ekusunguleni umgomo.
translated: Mhla ziyi-12 kuNdasa 2020, uMnyango Wezempilo waseNdiya umemezele ukuthi basebenzisana nezindawo ezizimele eziyi-11, nokuthi ngisho nangendlela esheshayo kuzothatha okungenani unyaka owodwa nesigamu kuya kwemibili ukwenza umuthi wokugoma.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Ngo-12 March 2020, i-Medicago, okuyinkampani ye-biotechnology yase-Quebec City, e-Quebec, yabika ukuthi kwakwakhiwe izinhlayiya ezifana ne-coronavirus ngaphansi koxhaso oluncane oluvela ku-Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
translated: Mhla ziyi-12 kuNdasa 2020, iMedicago, inkampani ye-biotechnology eQuebec City, eQuebec, yabika ngokuthuthukiswa kwezinhlayiyana ezifana ne-coronavirus ngaphansi koxhaso oluyingxenye lweCanada Institutes for Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Ikhendidethi yomgomo icwaningwa yilabhorethri, futhi ukuhlolwa kwabantu kuhlelelwe u-July noma u-August 2020.
translated: Umuntu ozogomela usocwaningweni lwaselabhorethri, kanti ukuhlolwa kwabantu kuhlelelwe uJulayi noma u-Agasti 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Ngasekuqaleni kwalelo viki, i-Guardian yabika ukuthi uMongameli wase-US uDonald Trump unikeze i-CureVac "'izizumbulu zezimali' ukuze ithole umgomo we-Covid-19", kanti uhulumeni waseJalimane wamelana nalokho.
translated: Ngasekuqaleni kwalelo sonto, iThe Guardian yabika ukuthi uMongameli waseMelika uDonald Trump unikeze iCureVac "'imali eningi' ukuze bathole umgomo we-Covid-19 kuphela", uhulumeni waseJalimane owabhikisha ngawo.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-17 March 2020, inkampane yemithi yaseMelika i-Pfizer yamemezela ukusebenzelana nenkampane yaseJalimane i-BioNTech ukuze zakhe ndawonye umgomo we-mRNA.
translated: Mhla ziyi-17 kuNdasa wezi-2020, inkampani yezemithi yaseMelika i-Pfizer yamemezela ukubambisana nenkampani yaseJalimane i-BioNTech ukuthuthukisa ngokuhlanganyela umuthi wokugoma osuselwa ku-mRNA.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Umgomo we-mRNA i-BNT162, njengamanje ohlolelwa ukusetshenziswa ngaphambi kokwelapha futhi ucwaningo lwezokwelapha lulindeleke ukuba luqale ngo-April 2020.
translated: Ikhandidethi lokugomela elisuselwa ku-mRNA i-BNT162, okwamanje isekuhlolweni kwangaphambi komtholampilo nezivivinyo zomtholampilo okulindeleke ukuthi ziqale ngo-Ephreli 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: E-Italy ngomhla ka-17 March 2020, iTakis Biotech, inkampane yezobuchwepheshe obubandakanya izinto eziphilayo yamemezela ukuthi izothola imiphumela yokuhlola kwangaphambi kokwelapha ngo-April 2020 futhi umgomo wayo wokugcina ungaqala ukuhlolwa kubantu ekwindla.
translated: E-Italy ngomhlaka-17 Mashi 2020, i-Takis Biotech, inkampani yase-Italy ye-biotech yamemezela ukuthi izoba nemiphumela yokuhlolwa kwangaphambi komtholampilo ngo-Ephreli 2020 futhi umuntu ozogomela ekugcineni angaqala ukuhlolwa kwabantu ngokuwa.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: E-France ngomhlaka-19 March 2020, i-Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) yamemezela ukutshala imali eyizigidi ezingu-US$4.9 kucwaningo oluyinhlanganisela lokuthola ikhambi le-COVID-19 oluhlanganisa i-Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), Kanye ne-University of Pittsburgh, okubeka ingqikithi yokutshala imali kwe-CEPI ekwakheni ikhambi le-COVID-19 ku-US$29 million.
translated: E-France ngomhlaka 19 Mashi 2020, i-Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) yamemezela ukutshalwa kwezimali kwezigidi ezingama-US $ 4.9 kunhlangano yocwaningo lokugomela i-COVID-19 ebandakanya i-Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria) kanye neNyuvesi yasePittsburgh, Isamba sokutshalwa kwezimali kwe-CEPI ekuthuthukisweni komgomo we-COVID-19 kuya ku-$29 million.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Abanye abalingane abangabatshali-zimali be-CEPI ekusunguleni umgomo we-COVID-19 yiModerna, i-Curevac, i-Inovio, i-Novavax, i-University of Hong Kong, i-University of Oxford, ne-University of Queensland.
translated: Abanye abalingani be-CEPI bokutshalwa kwezimali ekuthuthukisweni komgomo we-COVID-19 yiModerna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, University of Hong Kong, University of Oxford, kanye neNyuvesi yaseQueensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Ngomhla ka-20 March 2020, izikhulu zezempilo zaseRussia zamemezela ukuthi ososayensi sebeqalile ukuhlola izilwane ngemigomo eyisithupha ehlukahlukene.
translated: Ngomhla zingama-20 kuNdasa 2020, izikhulu zezempilo zaseRussia zamemezela ukuthi ososayensi sebeqalile ukuhlola izilwane zabantu abayisithupha abahlukene abazogomela.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Abacwaningi be-Imperial College London bamemezela ngomhla ka-20 March 2020 ukuthi basungula umgomo we-RNA wokuzixilonga wena we-COVID-19.
translated: Abaphenyi base-Imperial College London bamemezele ngomhla zingama-20 kuNdasa 2020 ukuthi bakha umuthi wokugomela i-RNA ozikhulisayo we-COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Lo mgomo wasungulwa phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-14 kutholakale umgomo eChina.
translated: Umuntu ozogoma uthuthukiswe zingakapheli izinsuku eziyi-14 ethole ukulandelana kwawo eChina.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Ngasekupheleni kuka-March, uhulumeni waseCanada wamemezela imali eyizigidi ezingu-C$275 yokuxhasa amaphrojekthi ocwaningo angu-96 ezindleleni zokwelapha i-COVID-19, okubandakanya imigomo eminingana ezinkampanini nasemayunivesithi ase-Canada, njengemisebenzi eyenziwa eMedicago nase-University of Saskatchewan.
translated: Ngasekupheleni kukaMashi, uhulumeni waseCanada umemezele u-C $ 275 wezigidi ngezimali zamaphrojekthi ocwaningo angama-96 mayelana nezinyathelo zokulwa ne-COVID-19, okuhlanganisa nenqwaba yabantu abazogomela ezinkampanini nasemanyuvesi aseCanada, njenge-Medicago kanye neNyuvesi yaseSaskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Cishe ngesikhathi esifanayo, uhulumeni waseCanada wamemezela izigidi ezingu-C$192 ngokukhethekile ukuze kusungulwe umgomo we-COVID-19, ngezinhlelo zokusungula "ibhange lemigomo" likazwelonke lemigomo emisha eminingana elingasetshenziswa uma kuqubuka enye i-coronavirus.
translated: Ngaso leso sikhathi, uhulumeni waseCanada umemezele u-C $ 192 wezigidi ngqo wokuthuthukisa umuthi wokugomela i-COVID-19, ngezinhlelo zokusungula "ibhange lokugoma" likazwelonke lemithi yokugoma eminingana engasetshenziswa uma kwenzeka okunye ukuqubuka kwe-coronavirus.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Ngomhla ka-2 April 2020, abacwaningi e-University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine babika ngokuhlola kwePittCoVacc, umgomo ongasetshenziswa we-COVID-19 emagundaneni, baveza nokuthi "imigomo ye-MNA ye-SARS-CoV-2 S1 ezimele ikhiphe imiphumela yezakhi zesifo enamandla yezakhi zesifo ezilwa namagciwane [emagundaneni] ebonakele emavikini angu-2 ngemva kokuthola umgomo."
translated: Ngomhla zi-2 kuMbasa wezi-2020, abacwaningi e-University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine babika ngokuhlolwa kwe-PittCoVacc, okungaba umuthi wokugomela i-COVID-19 kumagundane, bethi "i-MNA iletha imigomo ye-SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit yaveza izimpendulo ezinamandla ze-antigen-specific antibody [ kumagundane] abonakale ekuqaleni kwamaviki ama-2 ngemuva kokugoma."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: ECanada ngomhla ka-16 April 2020, i-University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy yamemezela ukuklanywa komgomo osekelwe ku-DNA ongaba isifutho sasemakhaleni.
translated: E-Canada ngomhla ziyi-16 kuMbasa 2020, iNyuvesi yaseWaterloo School of Pharmacy yamemezela ukwakheka komuntu ozogomela osuselwa ku-DNA njengesifutho samakhala.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Isebenzisa amagciwane asetshenziselwa ukwelapha, i-DNA izokwenziwa ukuba ikhiqize phakathi kwegciwane elikumuntu ukuze kukhiqizwe izinhlayiya ezingenangozi ezinjengegciwane, ezingase zikhuthaze amasosha omzimba ukuba akhiqize izakhi ezilwa ngokumelene negciwane le-SARS-CoV-2.
translated: Kusetshenziswa ama-bacteriophages, i-DNA izoklanywa ukuthi iphindaphindeke ngaphakathi kwamagciwane omuntu ukuze ikhiqize izinhlayiya ezingenabungozi ezifana negciwane, ezingase zikhuthaze amasosha omzimba ukuthi akhiqize amasosha omzimba alwa negciwane le-SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Ngo-March 2020, uhulumeni, izimboni, namayunivesithi amathathu ase-US ahlanganisa izinto zokusebenza ukuze athole amakhompyutha amakhulu ase-IBM, ahlanganiswe nezinto zekhompyutha zefu ezivela kwa-Hewlett Packard Enterprise, ku-Amazon, ku-Microsoft, naku-Google.
translated: NgoMashi 2020, uhulumeni wase-US, imboni, kanye namanyuvesi amathathu bahlanganisa izinsiza ukuze bafinyelele ama-supercomputers avela ku-IBM, kuhlanganiswe nezinsiza zekhompyutha zamafu ezivela ku-Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, kanye ne-Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Eminye imigomo inemiphumela yezinye izinto eziphilayo, ebizwa nangokuthi imiphumela engacacile.
translated: Eminye imithi yokugoma inemiphumela ye-heterologous, ebizwa nangokuthi imiphumela engaqondile.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Lokho kusho ukuthi ingaba nemiphumela engale kwesifo abasivimbelayo.
translated: Lokho kusho ukuthi bangaba nezinzuzo ngale kwesifo abasivimbelayo.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo olungahleliwe e-Australia lufuna ukubhalisa izisebenzi zezempilo ezingu-4,170.
translated: Olunye uvivinyo olungahleliwe e-Australia lufuna ukubhalisa abasebenzi bezempilo abangama-4,170.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Kungenzeka ukuthi imigomo esungulwayo ngeke iphephe noma isebenze.
translated: Kungenzeka imithi yokugoma esakhiweni iphephe noma isebenze kahle.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Ucwaningo lokuqala lokuhlola ukusebenza komgomo kusetshenziswa amamodeli ezilwane e-COVID-19, njengegundane eline-ACE2 efakelwe, ezinye izilwane zaselabhorethri, nezilwane ezifuze abantu, lubonisa isidingo semizamo yokuvikelwa egciwaneni engu-3 ekusingatheni amagciwane, nokusebenzelana namanye amazwe ukuze kuqinisekiswe izinqubo eziphephile ezisebenza yonke indawo.
translated: Ucwaningo lwangaphambi kwesikhathi lokuhlola ukusebenza komgomo kusetshenziswa izinhlobo zezilwane eziqondene ne-COVID-19, njengamagundane e-ACE2-transgenic, ezinye izilwane zaselabhorethri, nezinkawu ezingezona ezabantu, zikhombisa isidingo sezinyathelo zokuqukatha ze-biosafety-level 3 zokuphatha amagciwane aphilayo, nokuxhumana kwamazwe ngamazwe. ukuqinisekisa izinqubo zokuphepha ezisezingeni.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Imigomo ye-SARS ne-MERS iye yahlolwa kumamodeli ayizilwane angebona abantu.
translated: Imithi yokugomela i-SARS kanye ne-MERS ihlolwe ezilwaneni okungezona ezabantu.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-2020, alikho ikhambi noma umgomo oyisivikelo we-SARS oye wabonakala uphephile futhi usebenza kubantu.
translated: Kusukela ngo-2020, awukho umuthi wokwelapha noma ovikelayo wakwa-SARS okhonjiswe ukuthi uphephile futhi uyasebenza kubantu.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Ngokwamaphepha ocwaningo ashicilelwe ngo-2005 nango-2006, ukutholwa nokusungulwa kwemigomo nemithi emisha ekwelapheni i-SARS kwakuyinto esemqoka kohulumeni nama-ejensi ezempilo omphakathi emhlabeni wonke. Futhi awukho umgomo otholakele we-MERS.
translated: Ngokwamaphepha ocwaningo ashicilelwe ngo-2005 nango-2006, ukuhlonzwa kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwemithi yokugoma yamanoveli kanye nemithi yokwelapha i-SARS kwakuyinto ehamba phambili kohulumeni nezikhungo zezempilo zomphakathi emhlabeni wonke. Awukho futhi umuthi wokugomela i-MERS oqinisekisiwe.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Lapho i-MERS ibhebhetheka, kwaba nenkolelo yokuthi ucwaningo oselukhona lwe-SARS lunganikeza ithempulethi ewusizo ekusunguleni imigomo nezindlela zokwelapha igciwane le-MERS-CoV.
translated: Lapho i-MERS yanda, kukholakala ukuthi ucwaningo olukhona lwe-SARS lungase lunikeze isifanekiso esiwusizo sokuthuthukisa imithi yokugoma kanye nokwelapha ngokumelene nokutheleleka kwe-MERS-CoV.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Kusukela ngo-March 2020, kube nomgomo owodwa (we-DNA) we-MERS owaphothula isigaba I socwaningo lwezokwelapha kubantu, futhi eminye emithathu isacwaningwa, futhi yonke iyimigomo yama-viral-vector, ama-adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac) amabili, ne-MVA-vector eyodwa (MVA-MERS-S).
translated: Kusukela ngoMashi 2020, bekunomuthi wokugomela owodwa (osuselwa ku-DNA) we-MERS owaphothula ukuhlolwa komtholampilo kwesigaba I kubantu, kanye neminye emithathu eqhubekayo, yonke okuyimithi yokugomela i-viral-vectored, emibili ye-adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac ), kanye ne-MVA-vectored eyodwa (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Amaphosti ezinkundla zokuxhumana akhuthaza umqondo wokuthi igciwane elibangela i-COVID-19 liyaziwa nokuthi umgomo usuyatholakala kakade.
translated: Okuthunyelwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kukhuthaze umbono wozungu othi leli gciwane ngemuva kwe-COVID-19 belaziwa nokuthi umuthi wokugoma ubusutholakala.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Amaphethenti acashunwe kumaphosti ezinkundla zokuxhumana ezihlukahlukene abhekisela kumaphethenti akhona kakade okulandelana kwezakhi zofuzo kanye nemigomo yezinye izihlobo ze-coronavirus ezifana ne-SARS coronavirus.
translated: Amalungelo obunikazi ashiwo kokuthunyelwe okuhlukahlukene kwenkundla yezokuxhumana abhekisela kumalungelo obunikazi akhona ngokulandelana kofuzo kanye nemigomo yezinye izinhlobo ze-coronavirus njenge-SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Igciwane le-b'Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) yigciwane elithelelanayo elibangelwa yi-severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
translated: I-b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) yisifo esithathelwanayo esibangelwa i-acute acute kupumua syndrome i-coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Izimpawu zesifo ezivamile zibandakanya imfiva, ukukhwehlela, nephika.
translated: Izimpawu ezijwayelekile zihlanganisa imfiva, ukukhwehlela, nokuphelelwa umoya.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Ezinye izimpawu zingase zibandakanye ukukhathala, ubuhlungu bezicubu, uhudo, umphimbo obuhlungu, ukungezwa amaphunga, nobuhlungu esiswini.
translated: Ezinye izimpawu zingase zihlanganisa ukukhathala, ubuhlungu bemisipha, isifo sohudo, umphimbo obuhlungu, ukuphelelwa iphunga, nobuhlungu besisu.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Isikhathi ukusuka ekuchayekeni ukuya ekuqaleni kwezimpawu zesifo ngokuvamile siyizinsuku ezinhlanu kodwa singasukela ezinsukwini ezimbili kuya kweziyishumi nane.
translated: Isikhathi kusukela ekuchayekeni kuya ekuqalekeni kwezimpawu ngokuvamile siyizinsuku ezinhlanu kodwa singasukela ezinsukwini ezimbili kuye kweziyishumi nane.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Nakuba iningi lezigameko liphumela ezimpawini zesifo, ezinye ziphumela kunyumoniya ebhebhethekayo nokufa kwezitho eziningi.
translated: Nakuba izimo eziningi zibangela izimpawu ezithambile, ezinye ziqhubekela ku-viral pneumonia kanye nokwehluleka kwezitho eziningi.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-17 April 2020, kuye kwabikwa izigameko ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezingu-2.24 emazweni nasezindaweni ezingu-210, kwaphumela ekufeni kwabantu abangaphezu kuka-153,000.
translated: Kusukela ngomhlaka-17 Ephreli 2020, sekubikwe amacala angaphezu kwezigidi ezi-2.24 emazweni nasezifundeni ezingama-210, okuholele ekufeni kwabantu abangaphezu kuka-153,000.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Abantu abangaphezu kuka-568,000 baye balulama. Leli gciwane ngokuyinhloko lisakazeka phakathi kwabantu abathintanayo, ngokuvamile ngamaconsi amancanyana aphuma lapho ukhwehlela, uthimula, noma ukhuluma.
translated: Bangaphezu kuka-568,000 abantu abeluleme. Leli gciwane lisakazeka kakhulu phakathi kwabantu lapho besondelene, imvamisa ngamaconsi amancane akhiqizwa ukukhwehlela, ukuthimula, noma ukukhuluma.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Nakuba la maconsi ephuma lapho uphefumula, ngokuvamile awela phansi noma ezintweni kunokuba abe amagciwane emabangeni amade.
translated: Ngenkathi lawa maconsi ekhiqizwa lapho uphefumula, ngokuvamile awela phansi noma endaweni engaphezulu kunokuba atheleleke amabanga amade.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Abantu bangase bangenwe igciwane nangokuthinta indawo enegciwane bese bezithinta amehlo, ikhala, noma umlomo.
translated: Abantu bangase futhi batheleleke ngokuthinta indawo engcolile bese bethinta amehlo, ikhala, noma umlomo.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Leli gciwane lingaphila ezintweni amahora angaba ngu-72.
translated: Igciwane lingaphila endaweni engaba amahora angama-72.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Lithathelana kakhulu phakathi nezinsuku ezintathu zokuqala ngemva kokuqala kwezimpawu zesifo, nakuba lingabhebhetheka ngaphambi kokuvela kwezimpawu zesifo nasezigabeni zakamuva zegciwane. Indlela evamile yokuxilonga yi-reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) ngeswabhu yamankanka.
translated: Ithathelwana kakhulu phakathi nezinsuku ezintathu zokuqala ngemva kokuqala kwezimpawu, nakuba ukusabalala kungase kwenzeke ngaphambi kokuba kuvele izimpawu nasezigabeni zakamuva zesifo.Indlela evamile yokuxilongwa iwukuba i-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR). ) kusuka ku-nasopharyngeal swab.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Ukusetshenziswa kwamamaski kuyakhuthazwa kulabo abasola ukuthi banegciwane nabanakekeli babo.
translated: Ukusetshenziswa kwezifihla-buso kunconywa kulabo abasola ukuthi banaleli gciwane kanye nalabo ababanakekelayo.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Ukusikisela kokuba umphakathi wonkana usebenzise imaski kuyahluka, ezinye iziphathimandla zithi awangasetshenziswa, ezinye zithi awasetshenziswe, kanti ezinye ziyaphoqa ukuba asetshenziswe.
translated: Izincomo zokusetshenziswa kwezifihla-buso ngumphakathi jikelele ziyahlukahluka, ezinye iziphathimandla zitusa ngokumelene nokusetshenziswa kwazo, ezinye zitusa ukusetshenziswa kwazo, kanti ezinye zidinga ukusetshenziswa kwazo.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Njengamanje, awukho umgomo noma ukwelashwa okuqondile okulwa negciwane le-COVID-19.
translated: Okwamanje, awukho umuthi wokugoma noma umuthi othize we-antiviral we-COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Ukudluliselwa kwegciwane kuye kwatholakala emazweni amaningi kuzo zonke izindawo eziyisithupha ze-WHO.
translated: Ukudluliselwa kwalesi sifo endaweni kuqoshwe emazweni amaningi kuzo zonke izifunda eziyisithupha ze-WHO.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Labo abangenwa igciwane bangase bangabi nazimpawu zesifo noma babe nezimpawu zesifo ezinjengezomkhuhlane njengemfiva, umkhuhlane, ukukhathala, nephika.
translated: Labo abangenwe yileli gciwane bangase bangabi nazimpawu noma babe nezimpawu ezinjengomkhuhlane, ukukhwehlela, ukukhathala, nokuphelelwa umoya.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Izimpawu zesifo zesimo esiphuthumayo zibandakanya ubunzima bokuphefumula, ubuhlungu besifuba obuphikelelayo noma ingcindezi, ukudideka, ubunzima bokuvuka, nobuso nezindebe eziluhlazana; kukhuthazwa ukuthola usizo lukadokotela masinyane uma lezi zimpawu zesifo zibonakala.
translated: Izimpawu eziphuthumayo zihlanganisa ukuphefumula kanzima, ubuhlungu besifuba obuqhubekayo noma ingcindezi, ukudideka, ubunzima bokuvuka, ubuso obuluhlaza noma izindebe; ukunakekelwa ngokushesha kwezokwelapha kuyelulekwa uma lezi zimpawu zikhona.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Okungavamile, izimpawu ezithinta ukuphefumula ngenhla ezifana nokuthimula, amafinyila noma umphimbo obuhlungu zingase zibonakale.
translated: Ngokuvamile, izimpawu zokuphefumula eziphezulu ezifana nokuthimula, ikhala eligijimayo noma umphimbo obuhlungu zingase zibonakale.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Izimpawu zesifo emgudwini osuka emlonyeni uya ezinqeni njengesicanucanu, ukuhlanza nohudo ziye zabonakala ngamaphesenti ahlukahlukayo.
translated: Izimpawu zamathumbu ezinjengokucanuzela kwenhliziyo, ukuhlanza kanye nesifo sohudo ziye zabonwa ngamaphesenti ahlukahlukene.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Ezinye izigameko eChina zaqale zadala kuphela ukuqina kwesifuba nokushaya ngamandla kwenhliziyo.
translated: Amanye amacala e-China aqale aveza kuphela ukuqina kwesifuba kanye nokushaya kwenhliziyo.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Kwezinye, isifo singadlondlobala sibe yinyumoniya, sibulale izitho eziningi, futhi sibulale.
translated: Kwezinye, lesi sifo singase sidlulele ekubeni inyumoniya, ukwehluleka kwezitho eziningi, nokufa.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Lokhu kubizwa nangokuthi inkathi yokuvela kwezimpawu zesifo.
translated: Lokhu kubizwa isikhathi sokufukamela.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Inkathi yokuvela kwezimpawu zesifo ye-COVID-19 ngokuvamile iba izinsuku ezinhlanu kuya kweziyisithupha kodwa ingasukela ezinsukwini ezimbili kuya kwezingu-14.
translated: Isikhathi sokufukamela se-COVID-19 ngokuvamile siyizinsuku ezinhlanu kuya kweziyisithupha kodwa singasukela ezinsukwini ezimbili kuye kweziyi-14.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: U-97.5% wabantu ababa nezimpawu zesifo uba nazo phakathi nezinsuku ezingu-11.5 bengenwe isifo. Imibiko ibonisa ukuthi akubona bonke abangenwa igciwane ababa nezimpawu zesifo.
translated: U-97.5% wabantu ababa nezimpawu bazokwenza lokho phakathi nezinsuku eziyi-11.5 zokutheleleka.Imibiko ikhomba ukuthi akubona bonke abanaleli gciwane ababa nezimpawu.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Indima yalaba abangenazo izimpawu zesifo ekusidluliseleni kwabanye ayikaziwa ngokugcwele; nokho, ubufakazi bamanje busikisela ukuthi bangase babe negalelo ekubhebhethekeni kwegciwane.
translated: Iqhaza lalaba bathwali be-asymptomatic ekudluliselweni akukaziwa ngokugcwele; nokho, ubufakazi bokuqala bubonisa ukuthi bangase babe nomthelela ekusakazekeni kwalesi sifo.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Isibalo sabantu abangenwa igciwane abangabonisi izimpawu zesifo njengamanje asaziwa futhi sisacwaningwa, futhi i-Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) ibika ukuthi u-20% wabo bonke abangenwe igciwane ubulokhu ungenazimpawu zesifo ngesikhathi ulaliswe esibhedlela.
translated: Isibalo sabantu abanaleli gciwane abangabonisi zimpawu okwamanje asaziwa futhi siyafundwa, kanti iKorea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) ibike ukuthi ama-20% awo wonke amacala aqinisekisiwe ahlala engabonakali ngesikhathi behlala esibhedlela.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: I-National Health Commission yaseChina yaqala ukubandakanya izigameko zabangenazimpawu zesifo ezibalweni zayo zansuku zonke ngomhla ka-1 April; kwabanegciwane abangu-166 ngalolo suku, abangu-130 (78%) babengenazimpawu zesifo lapho behlolwa.
translated: I-National Health Commission yaseChina yaqala ukufaka amacala asymptomatic ezimweni zayo zansuku zonke ngomhlaka 1 Ephreli; kwezifo eziyi-166 ngalolo suku, eziyi-130 (78%) zazingenazimpawu ngesikhathi sokuhlolwa.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Kokubili isikhwehlela namathe kungaqukatha igciwane.
translated: Kokubili isikhwehlela namathe kungathwala igciwane elikhulu.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Ukukhulumela phezulu kukhipha amaconsi amaningana kunokukhuluma okuvamile.
translated: Ukukhuluma kakhulu kukhipha amaconsi amaningi kunokukhuluma okuvamile.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Ucwaningo eSingapore luthole ukuthi ukukhwehlela ngaphandle kokumboza kungaholela emaconsini ahamba amamitha angaba ngu-4.5 (amafithi angu-15).
translated: Ucwaningo olwenziwa eSingapore lwathola ukuthi ukukhwehlela okungamboziwe kungaholela ekutheni amaconsi ahambe afinyelele ku-4.5 metres (15 feet).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Nakuba igciwane ngokuvamile lingadluliseleki emoyeni, i-National Academy of Science isikisele ukuthi lingadluliseleka ngokuhogelwa futhi iziqongeleli zomoya ezisemaphaseji ngaphandle kwamagumbi abantu zakhipha amasampula aphozithivu egciwane le-RNA.
translated: Nakuba leli gciwane ngokuvamile lingahambi emoyeni, i-National Academy of Science iphakamise ukuthi kungenzeka ukudluliswa kwe-bioaerosol futhi abaqoqi bomoya ababekwe ephasishi ngaphandle kwamagumbi abantu bakhiphe amasampula anegciwane i-RNA.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Izinqubo ezithile zezokwelapha njengokufakwa kweshubhu ne-cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) zingabangela ukukhiqizwa kwezinhlayiya ukuba zikhishelwe emoyeni futhi kuphumele ekubhebhethekeni ngokuhogelwa.
translated: Ezinye izinqubo zezokwelapha ezifana ne-intubation kanye ne-cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) zingabangela ukufihla kokuphefumula ukuba kufakwe i-aerosolised futhi ngaleyo ndlela kubangele ukusabalala emoyeni.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Nakuba kunokukhathazeka kokuthi lingabhebhetheka ngendle, lobu bungozi kucatshangwa ukuthi buncane. Igciwane lithelelana kakhulu lapho abantu benezimpawu zesifo; nakuba ukubhebhetheka kungenzeka ngaphambi kokubonakala kwezimpawu zesifo, ubungozi buncane.
translated: Nakuba kunokukhathazeka ngokuthi kungase kubhebhetheke ngendle, le ngozi kukholakala ukuthi incane. Leli gciwane litheleleka kakhulu uma abantu benezimpawu; kuyilapho ukusabalala kungase kwenzeke ngaphambi kokuba kuvele izimpawu, ingozi incane.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: I- European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) ithi nakuba ingakacaci ngokuphelele indlela okulula ngayo ukuba igciwane libhebhetheke, umuntu oyedwa ngokuvamile uthelela abantu ababili noma abathathu. Igciwane liyaphila amahora kuya ezinsukwini ezintweni.
translated: I-European Center for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) ithi nakuba kungacaci kahle ukuthi lesi sifo sisakazeka kalula kangakanani, umuntu oyedwa ngokuvamile uthelela abantu ababili noma abathathu.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Ngokukhethekile, kwatholakala ukuthi igciwane liyaphila usuku olulodwa kukhadibhodi, izinsuku ezingaba zintathu kupulasitiki (i-polypropylene) nasensimbini (i-AISI 304), namahora angaba mane ethusini elingu-99%.
translated: Ngokukhethekile, leli gciwane litholakale likwazi ukubonakala usuku olulodwa ekhadini, kuze kube yizinsuku ezintathu kupulasitiki (i-polypropylene) nensimbi engagqwali (AISI 304), futhi kuze kube amahora amane ku-99% wethusi.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Nokho, lokhu, kuyahlukahluka kuye ngomswakama nezinga lokushisa.
translated: Lokhu, nokho, kuyehluka kuye ngomswakama nezinga lokushisa.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Insipho nayo ingasebenza uma isetshenziswe kahle; imikhiqizo yensipho iyalunciphisa ulwelwesi oluvikelayo lwamafutha egciwane, ilubulale, futhi iyalususa esikhunjeni nakwezinye izindawo.
translated: Insipho kanye nezinto zokuhlanza nazo ziyasebenza uma zisetshenziswe ngendlela efanele; imikhiqizo yensipho ilulaza ungqimba oluvikela amafutha egciwane, iluvale, futhi luyawakhulula esikhumbeni nakwezinye izindawo.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Ezinye izinsipho, njenge-benzalkonium chloride ne-chlorhexidine gluconate (isibulali magciwane sezindawo zokuhlinza), azisebenzi kahle. Ocwaningweni lwaseHong Kong, amasampula amathe athathwa ezinsukwini ezimbili ngemva kokuqala ukulaliswa esibhedlela.
translated: Ezinye izixazululo, ezifana ne-benzalkonium chloride ne-chlorhexidine gluconate (isibulala-magciwane esihlinzwayo), azisebenzi kangako.Ocwaningweni lwase-Hong Kong, amasampula amathe athathwa isilinganiso esiyizinsuku ezimbili ngemuva kokuqala kokulaliswa esibhedlela.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Ezigulini ezinhlanu kweziyisithupha, isampula lokuqala labonisa inani legciwane eliphakeme, futhi isiguli sesithupha sabonisa inani legciwane eliphakeme ngosuku lwesibili sihloliwe.
translated: Ezigulini ezinhlanu kweziyisithupha, isampula yokuqala yabonisa inani legciwane egazini eliphakeme kakhulu, futhi isiguli sesithupha sabonisa inani legciwane eliphezulu kakhulu ngosuku lwesibili oluhloliwe.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: I-severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) iyi-severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus embi kakhulu, eqala ngokukhishwa kubantu abathathu abanenyumoniya yaxhumeka ezifweni eziningi ezimbi kakhulu zokuphefumula eWuhan.
translated: I-Severe acute Respiratory Syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) iyinoveli enzima kakhulu yokuphefumula kwe-acute respiratory syndrome, eyaqala ukuhlukaniswa nabantu abathathu abanenyumoniya exhunywe kwiqoqo lamacala okugula okuphefumula kakhulu eWuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Zonke izici zegciwane le-SARS-CoV-2 elisha zivela kuma-coronavirus.
translated: Zonke izici zegciwane lenoveli i-SARS-CoV-2 zenzeka kuma-coronavirus ahlobene ngokwemvelo.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Lapho lingaphandle komzimba womuntu, igciwane libulawa insipho yasendlini, eqhumisa ibhamuza lalo elivikelayo. I-SARS-CoV-2 ihlobene eduze ne-SARS-CoV.
translated: Ngaphandle komzimba womuntu, leli gciwane libulawa insipho yasendlini, eqhuma ibhamuza eliyisivikelo.I-SARS-CoV-2 ihlobene eduze ne-SARS-CoV yasekuqaleni.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Amaphaphu ayizitho ezithinteka kakhulu ku-COVID-19 ngoba igciwane lingena kumaseli ayinhloko nge-enzyme okuthiwa yi-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), etholakala ngobuningi ohlotsheni II lwamaseli e-alveolar emaphashini.
translated: Amaphaphu ayizitho ezithinteka kakhulu yi-COVID-19 ngoba leli gciwane lifinyelela kumaseli aphethe nge-enzyme i-angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), egcwele kakhulu ohlotsheni II lwamaseli e-alveolar emaphashini.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Igciwane lisebenzisa i-glycoprotein ekhethekile ebizwa ngokuthi "i-spike" (peplomer) ukuze lixhumane ne-ACE2 futhi lingene kuseli eyinhloko.
translated: Igciwane lisebenzisa i-surface glycoprotein ekhethekile ebizwa nge-"spike" (peplomer) ukuze lixhume ku-ACE2 futhi lingene kuseli lomsingathi.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Ukulimala okubi kakhulu kwenhliziyo kwatholakala kubantu abangu-12% abanegciwane abalaliswe esibhedlela eWuhan, eChina, futhi kuyenzeka kakhulu ezifweni ezibucayi.
translated: Ukulimala kanzima kwenhliziyo kutholwe ku-12% wabantu abanaleli gciwane abangeniswe esibhedlela e-Wuhan, e-China, futhi kuvame kakhulu ezifweni ezinzima.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Amazinga ezimpawu zesifo ze-cardiovascular aphezulu, abangela ukuvuvukala kwesistimu nokugula kwamasosha omzimba phakathi nokudlondlobala kwesifo, kodwa ukuhlaseleka kwenhliziyo okubucayi kungenzeka nako kuhlobene nama-ACE2 receptors enhliziyweni.
translated: Amazinga ezimpawu zenhliziyo nemithambo yegazi aphakeme, ngenxa yokusabela kokuvuvukala kwesistimu kanye nokuphazamiseka kwamasosha omzimba ngesikhathi sokuqhubeka kwesifo, kodwa ukulimala okukhulu kwe-myocardial kungase kuhlotshaniswe nama-receptors e-ACE2 enhliziyweni.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Ama-ACE2 receptors abonakala kakhulu enhliziyweni futhi ahilelekile ekusebenzeni kwenhliziyo.
translated: I-ACE2 receptors ivezwa kakhulu enhliziyweni futhi ibandakanyeka ekusebenzeni kwenhliziyo.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Isigameko se-thrombosis (31%) ne-venous thromboembolism (25%) sitholakele ezigulini zase-ICU ezinegciwane le-COVID-19 futhi kungenzeka kuhlobene ne-prognosis ebuthaka. Ukuhlonzwa kwabantu ababulewe yi-COVID-19 kubonise i-diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), nokuvuvukala okune-lymphocyte emaphashini.
translated: Izehlakalo eziphezulu ze-thrombosis (31%) kanye ne-venous thromboembolism (25%) zitholwe ezigulini zase-ICU ezinezifo ze-COVID-19 futhi kungenzeka zihlobene nokubikezela okubi. DAD), kanye nokuvuvukala okuqukethe i-lymphocyte kungena ngaphakathi kwephaphu.

sourceString: Although SARS-COV-2 has a tropism for ACE2-expressing epithelial cells of the respiratory tract, patients with severe COVID-19 have symptoms of systemic hyperinflammation.
targetString: Nakuba i-SARS-COV-2 ine-tropism yamaseli e-ACE2-expressing epithelial omgudu wokuphefumula, iziguli ezine-COVID-19 ebucayi zinezimpawu zesifo se-systemic hyperinflammation.
translated: Yize i-SARS-COV-2 ine-tropism yamaseli e-epithelial aveza i-ACE2 wepheshana lokuphefumula, iziguli ezine-COVID-19 enzima zinezimpawu ze-systemic hyperinflammation.

sourceString: In particular, pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells were shown to correlate with the recruitment of inflammatory IL-6-secreting monocytes and severe lung pathology in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Ngokukhethekile, ama-pathogenic GM-CSF-secreting T-cells abonakale ehambelana nokutholwa kwama-IL-6-secreting monocytes avuvukele nezimbangela zesifo ezimbi ephashini ezigulini ezine-COVID-19.
translated: Ikakhulukazi, ama-T-cell akhiqiza i-GM-CSF-secreting T-cell akhonjiswe ukuthi ahlotshaniswa nokuqashwa kwama-monocyte avuvukalayo e-IL-6-secreting kanye ne-pathology enzima yamaphaphu ezigulini ze-COVID-19.

sourceString: Lymphocytic infiltrates have also been reported at autopsy.
targetString: Kuye kwabikwa nama-lymphocytic infiltrates lapho kuhlolwa izidumbu.
translated: Ukungena kwe-Lymphocytic kuye kwabikwa ekuhlolweni kwesidumbu.

sourceString: The WHO has published several testing protocols for the disease.
targetString: I-WHO iye yashicilela amaphrothokholi amaningana okuhlola igciwane.
translated: I-WHO ishicilele imigomo eminingi yokuhlola lesi sifo.

sourceString: The standard method of testing is real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Indlela evamile yokuhlola yi-reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
translated: Indlela evamile yokuhlola i-real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test is typically done on respiratory samples obtained by a nasopharyngeal swab; however, a nasal swab or sputum sample may also be used.
targetString: Ukuhlola kuvame ukwenziwa kumasampula okuphefumula atholakala ngeswabhu yasemankankeni; nokho, iswabhu yasemakhaleni noma isampula le-sputum nalo lingasetshenziswa.
translated: Ukuhlolwa ngokuvamile kwenziwa kumasampula okuphefumula atholwe nge-nasopharyngeal swab; noma kunjalo, i-swab yamakhala noma isampula yesikhwehlela nayo ingasetshenziswa.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to two days.
targetString: Imiphumela ngokuvamile itholakala ngemva kwamahora ambalwa kuya ezinsukwini ezimbili.
translated: Imiphumela ngokuvamile itholakala phakathi kwamahora ambalwa kuya ezinsukwini ezimbili.

sourceString: Blood tests can be used, but these require two blood samples taken two weeks apart and the results have little immediate value.
targetString: Ukuhlola igazi kungasetshenziswa, kodwa lokhu kudinga amasampula amabili egazi athathwa phakathi namaviki amabili futhi imiphumela inokubaluleka okuncane kwangaleso sikhathi.
translated: Ukuhlolwa kwegazi kungasetshenziswa, kodwa lokhu kudinga amasampula egazi amabili ahlukaniswe amasonto amabili futhi imiphumela inenani elincane elisheshayo.

sourceString: Chinese scientists were able to isolate a strain of the coronavirus and publish the genetic sequence so laboratories across the world could independently develop polymerase chain reaction (PCR) tests to detect infection by the virus.
targetString: Ososayensi baseChina bakwazile ukuhlukanisa ingxenye ye-coronavirus nokushicilela ukulandelana kwezakhi ukuze amalabhorethri emhlabeni wonke akwazi ukuzisungulela ukuhlola kwe-polymerase chain reaction (PCR) ukuze kubonwe igciwane ngesifo.
translated: Ososayensi baseShayina bakwazile ukuhlukanisa uhlobo lwe-coronavirus futhi bashicilela ukulandelana kofuzo ukuze izindawo zokucwaninga emhlabeni wonke zikwazi ukwenza ngokuzimela izivivinyo ze-polymerase chain reaction (PCR) ukuthola ukutheleleka ngaleli gciwane.

sourceString: As of 4 April 2020, antibody tests (which may detect active infections and whether a person had been infected in the past) were in development, but not yet widely used.
targetString: Kusukela ngomhla ka-4 April 2020, ukuhlolwa kwezakhi zesifo (okungathola amagciwane asebenzayo nokuthi umuntu useke waba nalo yini igciwane) kwasungulwa, kodwa akukasetshenziswa kabanzi.
translated: Kusukela ngomhlaka-4 Ephreli 2020, ukuhlolwa kwe-antibody (okungase kuhlonze izifo ezikhona nokuthi umuntu wayengenwe yini esikhathini esidlule) kwakusathuthuka, kodwa kungakasetshenziswa kabanzi.

sourceString: The Chinese experience with testing has shown the accuracy is only 60 to 70%.
targetString: Okutholwe amaShayina ekuhloleni kubonisa ukuthi ukunemba kungu-60 kuya ku-70% kuphela.
translated: Umuzwa wamaShayina wokuhlola ubonise ukunemba okungama-60 kuye kwangama-70 kuphela%.

sourceString: The FDA in the United States approved the first point-of-care test on 21 March 2020 for use at the end of that month.Diagnostic guidelines released by Zhongnan Hospital of Wuhan University suggested methods for detecting infections based upon clinical features and epidemiological risk.
targetString: I-FDA e-United States kwagunyaza ukuhlola kokuqala kokwelashwa ngomhla ka-21 March 2020 okwasetshenziswa ekupheleni kwaleyo nyanga. Iziqondiso zokuhlonzwa ezakhishwa yi-Zhongnan Hospital yase-Wuhan University zasikisela izindlela zokubona igciwane ngokusekelwe ezicini zokwelashwa nobungozi bokulawulwa kwesifo.
translated: I-FDA e-United States yagunyaza ukuhlolwa kokuqala kokunakekelwa ngomhla zingama-21 kuNdasa wezi-2020 ukuze kusetshenziswe ekupheleni kwaleyo nyanga. Imihlahlandlela yokuxilonga ekhishwe yiSibhedlela iZhongnan saseWuhan University iphakamise izindlela zokuthola izifo ezisekelwe ezicini zomtholampilo kanye nobungozi besifo.

sourceString: Bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution are common in early infection.
targetString: Ama-bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacities asakazeka nge-peripheral, asymmetric ne-posterior avamile ekungenweni yigciwane.
translated: Ama-opacities engilazi ephansi ye-multilobar ene-peripheral, asymmetric kanye nengemuva kuvamile ekuthelelekeni kwangaphambi kwesikhathi.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving (lobular septal thickening with variable alveolar filling), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.
targetString: I-subpleural dominance, i-crazy paving (ukushuba kwe-lobular septal nge-variable alveolar filling), ne-consolidation ingase ivele njengoba isifo sidlondlobala.
translated: Ukubusa kwe-subpleural, ukugandaywa okuhlanyayo (ukujiya kwe-lobular septal nokugcwaliswa kwe-alveolar okuguquguqukayo), nokuhlanganiswa kungase kubonakale njengoba isifo siqhubeka.

sourceString: Few data are available about microscopic lesions and the pathophysiology of COVID-19.
targetString: Incane idatha etholakalayo ngama-microscopic lesions nange-pathophysiology ye-COVID-19.
translated: Imbalwa idatha etholakalayo mayelana nezilonda ezincane kanye ne-pathophysiology ye-COVID-19.

sourceString: The main pathological findings at autopsy are:
targetString: Izimbangela eziyinhloko ezatholwa ekuhloleni nazi:
translated: Imiphumela eyinhloko ye-pathological ku-autopsy yilezi:

sourceString: Macroscopy: pleurisy, pericarditis, lung consolidation and pulmonary oedema
targetString: I-macroscopy: i-pleurisy, i-pericarditis, i-lung consolidation ne-pulmonary oedema
translated: I-Macroscopy: i-pleurisy, i-pericarditis, ukuhlanganiswa kwamaphaphu kanye ne-edema yamaphaphu

sourceString: Four types of severity of viral pneumonia can be observed:
targetString: Izinhlobo ezine zobunzima begciwane lenyumoniya zingabonakala:
translated: Izinhlobo ezine zobunzima be-viral pneumonia zingabonwa:

sourceString: mild pneumonia: pulmonary oedema, pneumocyte hyperplasia, large atypical pneumocytes, interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration and multinucleated giant cell formation
targetString: inyumoniya evamile: i-pulmonary oedema, i-pneumocyte hyperplasia, i-large atypical pneumocytes, i-interstitial inflammation with lymphocytic infiltration ne-multinucleated giant cell formation
translated: inyumoniya ethambile: i-pulmonary edema, i-pneumocyte hyperplasia, i-pneumocyte enkulu ye-atypical, ukuvuvukala kwe-interstitial nge-lymphocytic infiltration kanye nokwakheka kwamangqamuzana amakhulu amaningi.

sourceString: severe pneumonia: diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) with diffuse alveolar exudates.
targetString: inyumoniya ebucayi: i-diffuse alveolar damage (DAD) ne-diffuse alveolar exudates.
translated: inyumoniya enzima: ukusabalalisa ukulimala kwe-alveolar (DAD) ngokuphuma kwe-alveolar exudates.

sourceString: DAD is the cause of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) and severe hypoxemia.
targetString: I-DAD iyimbangela ye-acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) ne-severe hypoxemia.
translated: U-DAD uyimbangela ye-acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS) kanye ne-hypoxemia enzima.

sourceString: healing pneumonia: organisation of exudates in alveolar cavities and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
targetString: inyumoniya elaphekayo: inhlanganisela ye-exudates kuma-alveolar cavities ne-pulmonary interstitial fibrosis
translated: Ukuphulukisa i-pneumonia: inhlangano yama-exudates emigodini ye-alveolar kanye ne-pulmonary interstitial fibrosis

sourceString: Blood: disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); leukoerythroblastic reaction
targetString: Igazi: i-disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC); i-leukoerythroblastic reaction
translated: Igazi: ukusatshalaliswa kwe-intravascular coagulation (DIC); ukusabela kwe-leukoerythroblastic

sourceString: Preventive measures to reduce the chances of infection include staying at home, avoiding crowded places, washing hands with soap and water often and for at least 20 seconds, practising good respiratory hygiene and avoiding touching the eyes, nose or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Izinyathelo zokunciphisa amathuba okungenwa igciwane zihlanganisa ukuhlala endlini, ukugwema izindawo ezinezixuku, ukugeza izandla ngensipho namanzi kaningi imizuzwana engaba ngu-20, ukuzijwayelanisa nokuhlanzeka komlomo namakhala nokugwema ukuthinta amehlo, ikhala noma umlomo ngezandla ezingageziwe.
translated: Izindlela zokuvimbela ukwehlisa amathuba okutheleleka zihlanganisa ukuhlala ekhaya, ukugwema izindawo eziminyene, ukugeza izandla ngensipho namanzi njalo futhi okungenani imizuzwana engu-20, ukuzijwayeza inhlanzeko yokuphefumula nokugwema ukuthinta amehlo, ikhala noma umlomo ngezandla ezingageziwe.

sourceString: The CDC recommends covering the mouth and nose with a tissue when coughing or sneezing and recommends using the inside of the elbow if no tissue is available.
targetString: I-CDC ikhuthaza ukuvala umlomo nekhala ngethishu lapho ukhwehlela noma uthimula futhi ikhuthaza ukusebenzisa ingaphakathi lendololwane uma ithishu ingekho.
translated: I-CDC itusa ukuvala umlomo nekhala ngesicubu lapho ukhwehlela noma uthimula futhi itusa ukusebenzisa ingaphakathi lendololwane uma kungekho zicubu ezitholakalayo.

sourceString: Proper hand hygiene after any cough or sneeze is encouraged.
targetString: Ukugezwa kahle kwezandla ngemva kokukhwehlela noma ukuthimula kuyakhuthazwa.
translated: Ukuhlanzeka okufanele kwezandla ngemva kwanoma yikuphi ukukhwehlela noma ukuthimula kuyakhuthazwa.

sourceString: The CDC has recommended the use of cloth face coverings in public settings, in part to limit transmission by asymptomatic individuals.Social distancing strategies aim to reduce contact of infected persons with large groups by closing schools and workplaces, restricting travel and cancelling large public gatherings.
targetString: I-CDC ikhuthaza ukusetshenziswa kwendwangu yokuvala ubuso lapho usemphakathini, ngokwengxenye ukuze unciphise ukungenwa yigciwane elivela kubantu abangenazimpawu zegciwane. Amasu okuziqhelelanisa nabantu ahloselwe ukunciphisa ukuthintana kwabantu abanegciwane namaqembu amakhulu ngokuvalwa kwezikole nezindawo zomsebenzi, ukuvimbela ukuhamba nokukhansela imibuthano emikhulu.
translated: I-CDC iphakamise ukuthi kusetshenziswe izembozo zobuso bendwangu ezindaweni zomphakathi, ngokwengxenye ukuze kukhawulwe ukudluliselwa kwabantu abangenazimpawu. Amasu okuqhelelana nomphakathi ahlose ukunciphisa ukuthintana kwabantu abanaleli qembu ngamaqembu amakhulu ngokuvala izikole nezindawo zokusebenza, ukukhawulela ukuhamba nokukhansela imibuthano emikhulu yomphakathi.

sourceString: Distancing guidelines also include that people stay at least 6 feet (1.8 m) apart.
targetString: Iziqondiso zokuqhelelana zihlanganisa nokuthi abantu bahlale beqhelelene okungenani ngamafithi angu-6 (1.8 m).
translated: Imihlahlandlela yokuqhela iphinde ihlanganise nokuthi abantu bahlale okungenani ngokuqhelelana ngamamitha angu-1.8.

sourceString: There is no medication known to be effective at preventing COVID-19.As a vaccine is not expected until 2021 at the earliest, a key part of managing COVID-19 is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as "flattening the curve".
targetString: Awukho umuthi owaziwayo osebenzayo ekuvimbeleni i-COVID-19. Njengoba umgomo ungalindelekile kuze kube ngu-2021 okungenani, indlela ehamba phambili yokulawula i-COVID-19 ukuzama ukunciphisa amanani alabo abanegciwane, okubizwa ngokuthi "ukwenza umugqa ube isicaba".
translated: Awukho umuthi owaziwa ukuthi uyasebenza ekuvimbeleni i-COVID-19. Njengoba umuthi wokugoma ungalindelwe kuze kube ngu-2021 ekuqaleni, ingxenye ebalulekile yokulawula i-COVID-19 izama ukwehlisa inani eliphakeme lobhubhane, olwaziwa ngokuthi "ukunciphisa ijika".

sourceString: The CDC also recommends that individuals wash hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty, before eating and after blowing one's nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: I-CDC ikhuthaza nokuba abantu bageze izandla njalo ngensipho nangamanzi okungenani imizuzwana engu-20, ikakhulukazi ngemva kokuya endlini yangasese noma lapho izandla zibonakala zingcolile, ngaphambi kokudla nangemva kokufinya, ukukhwehlela nokuthimula.
translated: I-CDC futhi incoma ukuthi abantu bageze izandla njalo ngensipho namanzi okungenani imizuzwana engu-20, ikakhulukazi ngemva kokuya endlini yangasese noma lapho izandla zibonakala zingcolile, ngaphambi kokudla nangemva kokuphefumulela ikhala, ukukhwehlela noma ukuthimula.

sourceString: It further recommends using an alcohol-based hand sanitiser with at least 60% alcohol, but only when soap and water are not readily available.For areas where commercial hand sanitisers are not readily available, the WHO provides two formulations for local production.
targetString: Ikhuthaza nokuba kusetshenziswe isanithayiza yezandla ene-alcohol okungenani engu-60%, kodwa kuphela uma insipho namanzi kungatholakali kalula. Ezindaweni lapho amasanithayiza ezandla engatholakali kalula khona, i-WHO inikeza izindlela ezimbili zokuyikhiqiza endaweni.
translated: Iphinde income ukusebenzisa isibulali magciwane esine-alcohol enotshwala okungenani obungama-60%, kodwa kuphela uma insipho namanzi kungatholakali kalula. Ezindaweni lapho izibulali-magciwane zezandla ezentengiso zingatholakali kalula, i-WHO ihlinzeka ngezindlela ezimbili zokukhiqizwa kwendawo.

sourceString: In these formulations, the antimicrobial activity arises from ethanol or isopropanol.
targetString: Kulezi zindlela, umsebenzi we-antimicrobial uvela ku-ethanol noma i-isopropanol.
translated: Kulezi zakhiwo, umsebenzi we-antimicrobial uvela ku-ethanol noma i-isopropanol.

sourceString: Hydrogen peroxide is used to help eliminate bacterial spores in the alcohol; it is "not an active substance for hand antisepsis".
targetString: I-hydrogen peroxide isetshenziselwa ukusiza ekuqedeni ama-bacterial spores ku-alcohol; "akuyona ebulala igciwane ezintweni zokugeza izandla".
translated: I-hydrogen peroxide isetshenziselwa ukusiza ukuqeda izinhlamvu zebhaktheriya otshwaleni; "akuyona into esebenzayo ye-antisepsis yesandla".

sourceString: Glycerol is added as a humectant.
targetString: I-glycerol iyafakwa ukuze idale umswakama.
translated: I-Glycerol yengezwa njenge-humectant.

sourceString: People are managed with supportive care, which may include fluid therapy, oxygen support, and supporting other affected vital organs.
targetString: Abantu belashwa ngokunakekelwa, okungahlanganisa ukwelashwa ngoketshezi, ukunikwa umoya-mpilo, nokusekela ezinye izitho ezibalulekile ezithintekile.
translated: Abantu baphathwa ngokunakekelwa okusekelayo, okungase kuhlanganise ukwelapha ngoketshezi, ukwesekwa komoyampilo, nokweseka ezinye izitho ezibalulekile ezithintekayo.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that those who suspect they carry the virus wear a simple face mask.
targetString: I-CDC ikhuthaza ukuthi labo abanezinsolo zokuthi banegciwane bagqoke imaski yobuso evamile.
translated: I-CDC incoma ukuthi labo abasola ukuthi banaleli gciwane bagqoke imaskhi yobuso elula.

sourceString: Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) has been used to address the issue of respiratory failure, but its benefits are still under consideration.
targetString: I-extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) iye yasetshenziswa ekuxazululeni inkinga yokwehluleka ukuphefumula, kodwa izinzuzo zayo zisacatshangelwa.
translated: I-Extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) isetshenziselwe ukubhekana nenkinga yokwehluleka ukuphefumula, kodwa izinzuzo zayo zisacatshangelwa.

sourceString: Personal hygiene and a healthy lifestyle and diet have been recommended to improve immunity.
targetString: Ukuhlanzeka, ukuphila kanye nokudla okunempilo kuye kwakhuthazwa ukuze ungangenwa igciwane.
translated: Ukuhlanzeka komuntu siqu kanye nendlela yokuphila enempilo nokudla kuye kwatuswa ukuthuthukisa ukungatheleleki.

sourceString: Supportive treatments may be useful in those with mild symptoms at the early stage of infection.The WHO and Chinese National Health Commission have published recommendations for taking care of people who are hospitalised with COVID-19.
targetString: Izindlela zokwelapha ezisekela umzimba zingasiza kulabo abanezimpawu zesifo ezingezimbi abasanda kungenwa igciwane. I-WHO ne-Chinese National Health Commission zishicilele ukusikisela kokunakekela abantu abalaliswe esibhedlela abane-COVID-19.
translated: Ukwelashwa okusekelayo kungase kube usizo kulabo abanezimpawu ezithambile ekuqaleni kokutheleleka.I-WHO kanye ne-Chinese National Health Commission bashicilele izincomo zokunakekela abantu abalaliswe esibhedlela nge-COVID-19.

sourceString: Intensivists and pulmonologists in the U.S. have compiled treatment recommendations from various agencies into a free resource, the IBCC.
targetString: Ama-intensivists nama-pulmonologists e-U.S. ahlanganise izindlela zokwelashwa ezivela kuma-ejensi ahlukahlukene emthonjeni wamahhala, i-IBCC.
translated: Izazi ze-Intensivists kanye ne-pulmonologists e-US bahlanganise izincomo zokwelashwa ezivela kuma-ejensi ahlukahlukene bazenza isisetshenziswa samahhala, i-IBCC.

sourceString: As of April 2020, there is no specific treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Kusukela ngo-April 2020, ayikho indlela yokwelapha i-COVID-19.
translated: Kusukela ngo-Ephreli 2020, akukho ukwelashwa okuqondile kwe-COVID-19.

sourceString: For symptoms, some medical professionals recommend paracetamol (acetaminophen) over ibuprofen for first-line use.
targetString: Lapho kubonakala izimpawu zesifo, abanye odokotela bakhuthaza i-paracetamol (i-acetaminophen) kune-ibuprofen.
translated: Ukuze uthole izimpawu, abanye ochwepheshe bezokwelapha batusa i-paracetamol (acetaminophen) phezu kwe-ibuprofen ukuze isetshenziswe umugqa wokuqala.

sourceString: Precautions must be taken to minimise the risk of virus transmission, especially in healthcare settings when performing procedures that can generate aerosols, such as intubation or hand ventilation.
targetString: Kumelwe kuthathwe izinyathelo ukuze kuncishiswe ingozi yokudlulisela igciwane komunye, ikakhulu ezindaweni zokwelashwa lapho kwenziwa izinqubo ezingase zikhiqize ama-aerosol, njenge-intubation noma i-hand ventilation.
translated: Kumelwe kuthathwe izinyathelo zokuqapha ukuze kuncishiswe ubungozi bokudluliswa kwegciwane, ikakhulukazi ezilungiselelweni zokunakekelwa kwempilo lapho kwenziwa izinqubo ezingakhiqiza ama-aerosol, njengokufakela umoya noma ukungena komoya ngesandla.

sourceString: For healthcare professionals caring for people with COVID-19, the CDC recommends placing the person in an Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) in addition to using standard precautions, contact precautions and airborne precautions.The CDC outlines the guidelines for the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) during the pandemic.
targetString: Kodokotela abanakekela abantu abane-COVID-19, i-CDC ikhuthaza ukugcinwa komuntu ku-Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) ngaphezu kokusebenzisa izinyathelo ezivamile, ukuvimbela ukuthintana nokuhogela igciwane. I-CDC ichaza iziqondiso zokusetshenziswa kwe-personal protective equipment (PPE) phakathi nomqedazwe.
translated: Kubasebenzi bezempilo abanakekela abantu abane-COVID-19, i-CDC incoma ukuthi umuntu afakwe e-Airborne Infection Isolation Room (AIIR) ngaphezu kokusebenzisa izinyathelo zokuphepha ezijwayelekile, izindlela zokuphepha zokuphepha kanye nezindlela zokuphepha ezihamba emoyeni. I-CDC iveza imihlahlandlela yokusebenzisa ukuzivikela komuntu siqu. imishini (PPE) ngesikhathi sobhubhane.

sourceString: The recommended gear is: PPE gown, respirator or facemask, eye protection, and medical gloves.When available, respirators (instead of facemasks) are preferred.
targetString: Izinto ezidingekayo: igawuni ye-PPE, i-respirator noma imaski yobuso, isivikeli samehlo, namagilavu odokotela. Lapho etholakala, kukhuthazwa ama-respirator (esikhundleni samamaski obuso).
translated: Igiya elinconyiwe yileli: Ingubo ye-PPE, i-respirator noma i-facemask, isivikelo samehlo, namagilavu ezokwelapha.Uma etholakala, ama-respirators (esikhundleni samaski obuso) ayakhethwa.

sourceString: N95 respirators are approved for industrial settings but the FDA has authorised the masks for use under an Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
targetString: Ama-N95 respirators agunyazelwe ukusetshenziswa ezimbonini kodwa i-FDA igunyaze amamaski ukuba asetshenziswe ngaphansi kwe-Emergency Use Authorisation (EUA).
translated: Ama-respirators e-N95 agunyazwe izilungiselelo zezimboni kodwa i-FDA igunyaze imaski ukuthi isetshenziswe ngaphansi Kwegunya Lokusetshenziswa Kwezimo Eziphuthumayo (EUA).

sourceString: They are designed to protect from airborne particles like dust but effectiveness against a specific biological agent is not guaranteed for off-label uses.
targetString: Aklanyelwe ukuba avikele ezinhlayiyeni ezisemoyeni njengezintuli kodwa ukuvikelwa ku-ejenti yomzimba ethile akuqinisekisiwe ekusetshenzisweni kwayo.
translated: Zenzelwe ukuvikela ezinhlayiyeni ezihamba emoyeni njengothuli kodwa ukusebenza kahle ku-ejenti ethile yebhayoloji akuqinisekisiwe ngokusetshenziswa ngaphandle kwelebula.

sourceString: When masks are not available, the CDC recommends using face shields or, as a last resort, homemade masks.
targetString: Uma amamaski engatholakali, i-CDC isikisela ukusebenzisa ama-face shields noma, uma ingekho enye indlela, amamaski okuzenzela.
translated: Uma imaski ingatholakali, i-CDC incoma ukusebenzisa izihlangu zobuso noma, njengendlela yokugcina, imaski yasekhaya.

sourceString: Most cases of COVID-19 are not severe enough to require mechanical ventilation or alternatives, but a percentage of cases are.
targetString: Izimo eziningi ze-COVID-19 azizimbi kakhulu ukuba zingadinga i-mechanical ventilation noma ezinye izindlela, kodwa ezithile ziyakudinga.
translated: Izimo eziningi ze-COVID-19 azinzima ngokwanele ukuthi zingadinga ukungeniswa komoya ngomshini noma ezinye izindlela, kodwa iphesenti lamacala linjalo.

sourceString: The type of respiratory support for individuals with COVID-19 related respiratory failure is being actively studied for people in hospital, with some evidence that intubation can be avoided with a high flow nasal cannula or bi-level positive airway pressure.
targetString: Uhlobo lokusekelwa kwendlela yokuphefumula lwabantu abanenkinga yokuphefumula ehlobene ne-COVID-19 lusacwaningelwa abantu abasesibhedlela, futhi kunobufakazi obuthile bokuthi i-intubation ingagwenywa ne-high flow nasal cannula noma i-bi-level positive airway pressure.
translated: Uhlobo lokusekelwa kokuphefumula kwabantu abanenkinga yokuphefumula ehlobene ne-COVID-19 lufundelwa abantu abasesibhedlela ngenkuthalo, ngobufakazi obuthile bokuthi i-intubation ingagwenywa ngokugeleza okuphezulu kwe-nasal cannula noma i-bi-level positive airway pressure.

sourceString: Whether either of these two leads to the same benefit for people who are critically ill is not known.
targetString: Ukuthi lokhu okubili kuholela enzuzweni efanayo yini kubantu abagula kakhulu akwaziwa.
translated: Ukuthi noma yikuphi kwalaba ababili kuholela ekuhlomuleni okufanayo kubantu abagula kakhulu akwaziwa.

sourceString: Some doctors prefer staying with invasive mechanical ventilation when available because this technique limits the spread of aerosol particles compared to a high flow nasal cannula.Severe cases are most common in older adults (those older than 60 years, and especially those older than 80 years).
targetString: Abanye odokotela bancamela ukuhlala ne-invasive mechanical ventilation uma itholakala ngoba le ndlela inciphisa ukusakazeka kwezinhlayiya ezihogelwayo uma iqhathaniswa ne-high flow nasal cannula. Izimo ezimbi kakhulu zivamile kubantu abadala (abangaphezu kweminyaka engu-60, ikakhulu abangaphezu kweminyaka engu-80).
translated: Abanye odokotela bancamela ukuhlala bengena komoya omncane ohlaselayo uma utholakala ngoba le nqubo ikhawulela ukusabalala kwezinhlayiya ze-aerosol uma kuqhathaniswa nokugeleza okuphezulu kwe-cannula yamakhala.Izimo ezimbi zivame kakhulu kubantu abadala asebekhulile (kulabo abadala kuneminyaka engama-60, futhi ikakhulukazi labo abadala kuneminyaka engu-80) .

sourceString: Many developed countries do not have enough hospital beds per capita, which limits a health system's capacity to handle a sudden spike in the number of COVID-19 cases severe enough to require hospitalisation.
targetString: Amazwe amaningi asathuthuka awanayo imibhede eyanele yasezibhedlela, okunciphisa inani labantu abangelashwa okubangela ukwehluleka ukusingatha ukwenyuka ngokungalindelekile kwenani labantu abane-COVID-19 ebucayi edinga ukulaliswa esibhedlela.
translated: Amazwe amaningi athuthukile awanayo imibhede eyanele yesibhedlela ngomuntu ngamunye, okukhawulela amandla ohlelo lwezempilo lokusingatha ukukhuphuka okungazelelwe kwenani lamacala e-COVID-19 anzima ngokwanele ukuthi adinge ukulaliswa esibhedlela.

sourceString: One study in China found 5% were admitted to intensive care units, 2.3% needed mechanical support of ventilation, and 1.4% died.
targetString: Olunye ucwaningo eChina lwathola abangu-5% befakwe endaweni yababangwa nezibi, abangu-2.3% bedinga ukusizwa nge-ventilation, kanti abangu-1.4% bafa.
translated: Olunye ucwaningo olwenziwa eChina lwathola ukuthi ama-5% angeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu, ama-2.3% adinga ukusekelwa ngemishini kokungena komoya, kwathi u-1.4% washona.

sourceString: In China, approximately 30% of people in hospital with COVID-19 are eventually admitted to ICU.
targetString: EChina, cishe u-30% wabantu esibhedlela abane-COVID-19 bagcina befakwe ku-ICU.
translated: E-China, cishe u-30% wabantu abasesibhedlela abane-COVID-19 bagcina bengeniswa e-ICU.

sourceString: Mechanical ventilation becomes more complex as acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) develops in COVID-19 and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.
targetString: Imishini ye-ventilation iba inkimbinkimbi kakhudlwana njengoba i-acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) yakheka ku-COVID-19 futhi ukuphefumula kuya ngokuya kuba nzima.
translated: Ukungena komoya ngomshini kuba nzima kakhulu njengoba i-acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS) ikhula ku-COVID-19 futhi umoya-mpilo uya ngokuya usiba nzima.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: Ama-ventilators anamamodi okulawula ingcindezi ne-PEEP ephezulu ayadingeka ukuze kukhushulwe ukutholakala komoya-mpilo kuyilapho kuncishiswa ingozi yokulimala kwamaphaphu ehlobene nama-ventilator ne-pneumothorax.
translated: Ama-ventilators akwazi ukulawula ingcindezi kanye ne-PEEP ephezulu ayadingeka ukuze kwandiswe ukulethwa komoyampilo ngenkathi kuncishiswa ubungozi bokulimala kwamaphaphu okuhambisana ne-ventilator kanye ne-pneumothorax.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: I-PEEP ingase ingatholakali kuma-ventilator amadala.
translated: I-PEEP ephezulu ingase ingatholakali kuma-ventilators amadala.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: Ucwaningo lwezindlela zokwelashwa lwaqala ngo-January 2020, futhi imithi eminingana elwa negciwane isocwaningweni lwezokwelapha.
translated: Ucwaningo ngemithi engase ibe khona luqale ngoJanuwari 2020, futhi imishanguzo eminingi elwa namagciwane isezivivinyweni zomtholampilo.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: I-remdesivir kubonakala kuyiyona ezosebenza.
translated: I-Remdesivir ibonakala ithembisa kakhulu.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: Nakuba kungafika u-2021 kusasungulwa imithi emisha, eminingana yemithi ehlolwayo isigunyaziwe kakade ukusetshenziselwa okunye noma isithuthukile ekuhlolweni kakade.
translated: Nakuba imithi emisha ingathatha kuze kube u-2021 ukuze ithuthuke, eminingana yemithi ehlolwayo isivele igunyazelwe okunye ukusetshenziswa noma isivele isokuhlolwa okuthuthukile.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: Imithi elwa negciwane ingazanywa kubantu abanegciwane elibucayi.
translated: Imithi elwa namagciwane ingase izame kubantu abanesifo esibi.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: I-WHO ikhuthaza amavolontiya ukuba abambe iqhaza ocwaningweni lokusebenza nokuphepha kwemithi engasetshenziselwa ukwelapha. I-FDA igunyaze okwesikhashana i-convalescent plasma njengendlela yokwelapha ecwaningwayo ezimweni lapho umuntu esebangwa nezibi khona.
translated: I-WHO watusa amavolontiya ukuthi abambe iqhaza ezivivinyweni zokusebenza ngempumelelo nokuphepha kwemithi engaba khona.I-FDA inikeze ukugunyazwa kwesikhashana ku-plasma ye-convalescent njengendlela yokwelapha yokuhlola ezimeni lapho ukuphila komuntu kusengozini kakhulu noma ngokushesha.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: Ayikangeni ocwaningweni lwezokwelapha oludingekayo ukuze kubonakale ukuthi iphephile nokuthi iyasebenza ekwelapheni isifo.
translated: Ayikenziwa izifundo zomtholampilo ezidingekayo ukukhombisa ukuthi iphephile futhi iyasebenza kulesi sifo.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: Ngo-February 2020, eChina kwasungulwa i-app yeselula yokusingatha ukuqubuka kwegciwane.
translated: NgoFebhuwari 2020, iChina yethula uhlelo lokusebenza lweselula ukubhekana nokuqubuka kwalesi sifo.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: Abasebenzisi bacelwa ukuba bafake igama nenombolo ye-ID.
translated: Abasebenzisi bayacelwa ukuthi bafake amagama abo nenombolo kamazisi.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: Le app ikwazi ukubona 'uma usondelana nomuntu' isebenzisa idatha yokuthungatha okungaba ingozi yokungenwa igciwane.
translated: Uhlelo lokusebenza luyakwazi ukubona 'osondelene naye' lisebenzisa idatha yokugada ngakho-ke ingozi engaba khona yokutheleleka.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: Bonke abasebenzisi bangabheka isimo sabanye abasebenzisi abathathu.
translated: Wonke umsebenzisi angabheka futhi isimo sabanye abasebenzisi abathathu.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: Uma kubonakala isimo esingaba yingozi, i-app ayikhuthazi kuphela ukuzihlukanisa nabantu, kodwa ixwayisa neziphathimandla zezempilo. Ukuhlaziywa kwedatha eningi ngedatha yeselula, ubuchwepheshe bokuqaphela ubuso, ukulandelela ucingo lweselula nolwazi olusunguliwe kuyasetshenziswa ekuthungatheni abantu abanegciwane nabantu ababathintile eNingizimu Korea, eTaiwan naseSingapore.
translated: Uma kutholwa ubungozi obungase bube khona, uhlelo lokusebenza aluncomi nje kuphela ukuzehlukanisa, kodwa futhi lazisa izikhulu zezempilo zendawo.
